Administrative Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายธุรการและประสานงานทั่วไปJBEVERAGE (THAILAND)CO.,LTD.Job Highlights
20,000-45,000 THB, Negotiable
Near BTS Asok, MRT Sukhumvit
English Business Level or Japanese Business LevelOffice Location: Near BTS - Asok / RSU Tower 7th Floor, Sukhumvit 31
Employment Type:  Permanent
Compensation:  20,000-45,000 THB, Negotiable
Working Time: Mon-Fri. 08.30am-17.30pm 
Website: http://jbeverage.com

Job descriptions


Issue the TAX Invoice and Quotation
Active participation in office management.
Attend meetings with supplier , schedule meetings and appointment.
Preparing formal letters, documents or reports as assigned.
Checking internal daily documents such as tax invoice 
Performing other special job as assigned.
Maintain good relationship with current clients.

Qualifications


Bachelor’s Degree or Higher 
Strong communication and negotiation skills.
Good command of written and spoken Japanese (N2,N3) or  English (TOEIC at least 650)
Full Service mind, good interpersonal skill, able to handle confidentiality.
Able to handle pressure and multiple tasks. Excellent time management skills, ability to prioritize.
Self-directed and able to work without supervision.
Good computer skills, knowledge in Microsoft office.

Benefits


Health/Medical Insurance
Perfect Attendance
Interested candidate, please submit a full detail resume in English including expected salary with a recent photograph to the e-mail address

JBEVERAGE (THAILAND) CO., LTD.

571 RSU Tower, 7th Floor, Sukhumvit 31, Sukhumvit Road,
Klongton Nua, Wattana, Bangkok, 10110 Thailand
T : +66(0)2-258-4915   F : +66(0)2-258-4918

Production Engineer/Industrial Engineer/วิศวกร/ วิศวกรฝ่ายผลิต/ วิศวกรโรงงานFuture Makers Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Career opportunity in an international environment
Meeting with Team management every week
Salary: 25,000 - 45,000More about this position:
https://fb.watch/kGAQF2CcSp/

สถานที่ทำงาน: โรงงานพระราม2 (ติดเซนทรัลพระราม2)

คุณสมบัติ
1. จบปริญญาตรีด้าน วิศวกรรมผลิต,อุตสาหกรรม, ซัพพลายเชน, โลจิสติก หรือคณะที่เกี่ยวข้อง
2. เกรดเฉลี่ย2.6ขึ้นไป
3. มีความรู้พื้นฐาน JIT, TPS, 5S, Lean เป็นอย่างดี
4. อยากท้าทายความสามารถตัวเอง
5. อยากเติบโตไวกว่ามาตรฐานในสายอาชีพเดียวกัน
6. ขยันอดทนทำงานเป็นทีมได้ดี
7. มีความเป็นผู้นำสูง

สวัสดิการ
1. ทั่วไป
2. 20,000บาท ครอบคุมพ่อแม่50%
3. อาหารขนมกลางวันฟรี
4. โรงอาหารหอพักราคาถูก
5. สิทธิ์ในการซื้อหุ้นราคาพิเศษในอนาคต

แนะนำบริษัทคร่าวๆ: FM เป็นบริษัทStart Up,จำนวนพนักงาน300-400คน

ปัจจบันดำเนินการ โรงงานเฟอร์นิเจอร์

เป้าหมายคือ Market Place4.0 หรือการควบคุมโรงงานต่างๆของในเครือในประเทศต่างๆได้ จากHQกรุงเทพ ผ่านการพัฒนาระบบการผลิต และSoftware (อาทิตโรงงานมาเลเซีย2024/Q1 และ USA 2024/Q4)

บริษัทมีระบบERPที่เขียนขึ้นเองเชื่อมโยง พนักงาน ซึ่งระบบที่เขียนจะถูกพัฒนาขึ้นเรื่อยๆจากRequirements ของทีมวิศวกร
ยกตัวอย่าง ระบบบาโค๊ดในแต่ละจุด ทำให้ประเมินผลตอบแทน พนักงานไลน์ผลิตรายบุคคลได้แม่นยำและยุติธรรมขึ้น

สำหรับงานของวิศวกร ทำงานวิเคราะห์ พัฒนา ออกแบบ แก้ปัญหา เท่านั้น ไม่ใช่งานRoutine

บริษัทมีการแบ่งระดับพนักงานในโรงงานออกเป็น4กลุ่ม

1. Power (พนักงานผลิต)
2. Operator ( หัวหน้ากะ, พนักงานสายอาชีพ)
3. Supervisors
4. Managers

โดยในการเก็บข้อมูลหรืองานRoutine แก้ไขปัญหาเบื้องต้นจะเป็นหน้าที่ของระดับO

โดยระดับเริ่มต้นของวิศวกรจบใหม่จะเริ่มที่S1 หรือSupervisor Level1

สามารถศึกษาข้อมูลเพื่อเติมเกี่บวกับงานวิศวกรรมของFM ประสบการณ์ความเห็นของวิศวกรปัจจุบันและข้อมูลบริษัทได้ที่เพจ FM career

Sports & Activities AdministratorKing's College International School BangkokJob Highlights
overseeing and managing various activities
strong administrative background
Plan, schedule, and coordinate fixturesWe are seeking a dedicated and enthusiastic Sports & Activities Administrator with a strong administrative background to join our team. The coordinator will be responsible for overseeing and managing various sports and activities within the organisation, ensuring smooth logistics, coordinating fixtures and tournaments, and maintaining administrative tasks related to sports events. The successful candidate will be detail-oriented, organised, and possess excellent communication skills to liaise with stakeholders, coaches, and participants effectively.

Responsibilities and Duties:

Fixtures/Tournaments Management:

Plan, schedule, and coordinate fixtures and tournaments for various sports and activities.
Collaborate with teams, coaches, and other institutions to organise inter-house tournaments and external competitions.
Ensure all logistical arrangements for tournaments are in place, including venues, equipment, and referees.

House Tournaments:

Facilitate and supervise house tournaments, fostering a competitive and enjoyable environment for participants.
Coordinate teams, schedule matches, and maintain scores and results.

Swim Galas/Sports Days/Liaise with Local Stadiums:

Organise and oversee swim galas and sports days, coordinating with relevant staff, students, and parents.
Liaise with local stadiums or sports facilities for hosting events and securing necessary permits.

 Administrative Tasks:

Maintain an organised and up-to-date calendar of sports events and activities.
Handle logistics, including transportation arrangements for away games or events.
Coordinate with referees, Thai coaches, and estates personnel to ensure smooth operations during events.
Arrange catering needs for participants and spectators during tournaments.

 Medical & Dietary Needs:

Collaborate with relevant medical staff and coaches to address medical and dietary requirements of participants.
Ensure necessary medical personnel are available during events, if required.

 Equipment Management:

Manage sports equipment inventory, ensuring all items are in good condition and readily available for curriculum lessons, CCAs and ECAs.
Coordinate equipment maintenance and repairs as needed and inform Head of PE and Director of Sport of any items in need of repair.
Order new equipment when necessary, following budget guidelines.

 Lesson Set-up:

Assist in setting up lessons and training sessions for various sports and activities.
Ensure all necessary materials and equipment are ready for each session.

 Certificate Design/Printing - PA:

Design and print certificates for participants, winners, and achievers in various sports and activities.
Prepare and organise presentations or announcements during award ceremonies.

 Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Sports Management, Physical Education, or a related field (preferred).
Proven experience in sports event coordination and administration.
Excellent organisational and time-management skills.
Strong interpersonal and communication abilities.
Ability to work well under pressure and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
Proficient in using computer software for scheduling, administrative tasks, and certificate design.
Knowledge of sports rules, regulations, and best practices is desirable.

This role presents an exciting opportunity for a proactive individual to contribute to the vibrant sports culture within our organisation. If you are passionate about sports, highly organised, and excel in administrative tasks, we encourage you to apply and become a part of our dynamic team.

 Professionalism:

To arrive at school punctually.
To follow the dress code at school.
To uphold the image of the school both while in and out of school.

Qualities, Qualifications and Skills Essential:

To demonstrate our values, especially kindness, good manners and wisdom.
A bachelor’s degree or equivalent.
Good English and Thai oracy and literacy.
Good numeracy skills
The ability to work well as part of a team.
A friendly, professional and approachable manner with colleagues, students and parents.
To understand the requirement to maintain confidentiality between colleagues, students and parents.
Competent ICT skills.

Important Note:

King’s College International School Bangkok is fully committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and expects all staff to share this commitment. Any offer of employment will be subject to the receipt of an enhanced DBS disclosure/ICPC, a criminal records check, suitably translated if you teach outside of the UK, satisfactory references, and medical clearance.undefined

Recruitment and Administration Executive (ติดบีทีเอสพญาไท)/เจ้าหน้าที่สรรหาทรัพยากรบุคคลและงานธุรการPhenomenon EnterpriseJob Highlights
ขยันและมีบุคลิกภาพดี
มีทักษะการสื่อสารทางโทรศัพท์
ยินดีพิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่ และผู้ไม่มีประสบการณ์สถานที่ทำงาน

อาคารพญาไทพลาซ่า ติดบีทีเอสพญาไท/แอร์พอร์ตลิ้งค์พญาไท

หน้าที่หลัก
- สรรหาบุคลากรเข้ามาร่วมงานกับทางบริษัท ผ่านทางช่องทาง Ads ประกาศงาน/ search ผ่าน Job Ads/ ช่องทางการสมัครงานช่องทางSocial media ที่กำลังเป็นที่นิยม
- ออกแบบ Ads ประกาศงานและโพสต์ตำแหน่งงานในช่องทาง Social media ภายใต้บัญชีของบริษัท
- โทรติดต่อนัดหมายผู้สัมภาษณ์งานและดำเนินขั้นตอนการรับสมัครตามกระบวนการของบริษัท
- ดูแลเอกสารการสมัครงานของผู้สัมภาษณ์และเอกสารอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับบริษัท
- ต้อนรับฝ่ายหน้า สำหรับผู้เข้ามาติดต่อบริษัท
- หน้าที่ฝ่ายธุรการ จัดเก็บเอกสารฝ่ายขาย สนับสนุนงานฝ่ายขาย และงานเอกสารภายในบริษัท
- ติดต่อ ประสานงานระหว่างบริษัท สำนักงานใหญ่ภายในประเทศและต่างประเทศ
- สามารถใช้งานคอมพิวเตอร์ได้ดี เนื่องจากต้องบันทึกข้อมูลต่างๆด้วยระบบส่วนกลางของบริษัท
- สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Excel เบื้องต้นได้

คุณสมบัติ
- วุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี ทุกสาขา(มีสอนงานให้ก่อนเริ่มงาน)
- ขยัน กระตือรือร้น มีทักษะในการสื่อสาร ละเอียดรอบคอบ ใจเย็น และสนใจเรียนรู้ประสบการณ์ใหม่ๆ
- สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษ สื่อสาร พูดคุย เขียน อ่าน ตอบ E-mail ภาษาอังกฤษได้ดี
- สามารถเดินทางไป ต่างจังหวัด ต่างประเทศได้
- สามารถเข้าร่วมกิจกรรมของบริษัทได้ เช่น งานประชุม กิจกรรมภายในบริษัทหรือกิจกรรมภายนอกบริษัท


วันหยุดธนาคาร นักขัตฤกษ์
ทำงานจันทร์-ศุกร์ เวลา 8.30-17.30 น.

HR Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่ทรัพยากรบุคคลEXP SystemJob Highlights
WFH / Hybrid
HR Generalist
Fulfilling Responsibilitiesรับผิดชอบการทำเงินเดือนในระบบ Payroll

จัดเก็บข้อมูลพนักงาน เช่น การลางาน การเข้างาน และข้อมูลพนักงานใหม่

จัดการเรื่องสวัสดิการของพนักงาน เช่น ประกันสังคม และสวัสดิการอื่นๆของบริษัท

ทำการสรรหาบุคคลากรที่มีความรู้ความสามารถ ตั้งแต่การลงประกาศงาน สัมภาษณ์ ไปจนถึงติดตามผลการทำงาน

จัดทำเอกสารที่ได้รับมอบหมาย เช่น สัญญาจ้างงาน และเอกสาร VISA

ตรวจสอบ และจัดเก็บเอกสารในส่วนของบัญชี เพื่อนำส่งสำนักงานบัญชีภายนอกทุกเดือน

นำเสนอสวัสดิการ และจัดหาการฝึกอบรมที่เหมาะสมกับพนักงาน

วางแผนกำลังคน

ดูแลกฎระเบียบและความสัมพันธ์ภายในองค์กร

จัดทำวันหยุดประจำปี

งานเอกสาร และงานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมาย


คุณสมบัติ

จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีในสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับส่วนงานทรัพยากรบุคคล

มีประสบการณ์การทำงานด้านทรัพยากรบุคคลอย่างน้อย 1 ปีขึ้นไป

หากเคยทำระบบ Payroll ของธนาคารกสิกรไทย (สามารถใช้โปรแกรม flowaccount ได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ)

สามารถใช้ Microsoft Office (Word, Excel และ Powerpoint) รวมถึง Google Workspace ได้อย่างชำนาญ

ตรงต่อเวลา

มีทักษะในการสื่อสาร ต่อรอง และประนีประนอมได้ดี

มีความละเอียดรอบคอบในการทำงาน

มีทัศนคติ และอัธยาศัยที่ดี 

มี Service mind

หากมีทักษะ ฟัง พูด อ่าน เขียน ภาษาอังกฤษได้จะรับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษundefined

Senior Supply Chain CoordinatorAlchemy Wines and Spirits (Thailand) Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Supply Chain Coordinator
Good communication of written and spoken English
Ability to work independentlyRESPONSIBILITIES

Effective stock needs planning based on sales forecast by brands.
Monitor and control inventory and stock movement by brands.
Work cooperatively and cross-functionally with procurement, supply chain AAS & Finance to follow up order, keep update regarding shipment, follow up with stock movement, prepare paperwork’s, arrange sample when needed.
Reporting responsibilities: Sales report analysis as requested by management.
Coordinating with Sales team’s members, import and export, order plans, needs & delivery of goods to customers by timeline.
Summarize stock depletion and shipment report.
Prepare Monthly and Quarterly Brand depletion report.
Handle the import procedures - register the labels and submit the excise code.

Qualifications


Bachelor’s degree in any field.
2 years relevant working experience (logistics is preferable)
Ability to multi-task, prioritize and manage time effectively
Enthusiast, passionate, creative, willing to learn and like challanging;
Good planning, team management skills.
Good communication of written and spoken English
Experience Microsoft office (Excel,Word,Powepoint) Especially Photoshop.
2 years relevant working experience (logistics is preferable)
Self-motivated, self-initiated, passion for actions and results oriented.
Ability to work independently and be highly organized and withstand high pressure and tight timelines.

Location : LangSuan Road ; BTS Chitlomundefined

Sales CoordinatorEnwei Group Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
ปริญญาตรีด้านบริหารธุรกิจหรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง
ประสบการณ์ 2-3 ปี ในงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง
มีทักษะด้านการติดต่อสื่อสารที่ดีJob Purpose:
ประสานงานฝ่ายขายทั้งภายในและภายนอกองค์กร รวมถึงดำเนินการเกี่ยวกับงานด้านเอกสารต่างๆ

Key Responsibilities:

เข้าใจในเอกสารเกี่ยวกับยาและการจัดเตรียมเอกสารเพื่อเข้าประชุมยาของแต่ละโรงพยาบาล
ดูแลรับผิดชอบและจัดเตรียมเอกสารที่เกี่ยวกับการขายทุกชนิด เช่น ใบเสนอราคา คำสั่งซื้อ จดหมายต่างๆ
สามารถจัดเตรียม File Presentation เพื่อใช้ประกอบข้อมูลการนำเสนอการขาย
จัดเตรียมรายงานการขายประจำวัน ประจำสัปดาห์ และประจำเดือน
หา Supplier ในการทำอุปกรณ์/สื่อประกอบการขายต่างๆ
ทำตารางนัดหมายการประชุม จัดทำบันทึกการประชุมและรายงานต่างๆ
Set Zoom meeting หรือ Google meet ในการจัดประชุม Online ต่างๆ
ติดต่อประสานงานกับทีมขาย ทีมที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อให้การขายและการจัดส่งสินค้าเป็นด้วยความเรียบร้อย
งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากหัวหน้างาน

Purchasing Coordinator

Department:

KeyResponsibilities:

The Purchasing Coordinator reports directly to the Administrative Manager and is part of the Administration team responsible for the effective operation of the school Purchasing Department.  In particular, the Senior Purchasing Officer will

Conduct and follow the school’s purchasing function according to the school policy and in particular
review and monitor procurement requests and records to ensure compliance, maintain appropriate purchase documentation and obtain the necessary approvals
liaise with users and departmental heads regarding requirements and specifications of items requested for purchase challenge requests and add value by sourcing the appropriate goods to service the requirement cost effectively
o    raise and control purchase orders from approved purchase requisitions as required

o    ensure the checks on invoices for good received are undertaken to ensure quantity, quality and specifications are as ordered

o    regularly review the purchasing market and build mutually beneficial relationships with key suppliers to enhance purchasing process and create overall value add

o    shipping arrangements are made

o    quotes are approved before ordering

o    customs documentation is raised

o    delivery timelines are met

o    co-ordinate and receive delivery of shipments at the school and distribute to the accurate departments

Assist with the management and operation of the reimbursement process, ensuring that claims are valid and with policy for approval
Check purchase requests are within or out of budget and taking action to ensure that the correct process is followed accordingly
Ensure that purchasing request, purchase order, subscription, budgeting information is recorded accurately, efficiently and published
To support the logistics and arrangements of major school events e.g. sports day, FOBISIA competitions

have a good English and Thai communication skills
be flexible in approach to work and enjoy working as part of a team
respect confidentiality as required
promote a favourable impression of the school at all times
comply with the school’s policies and procedures.

Sales and Administraton - Cosmetic Surgery Tourism (Bangkok)Azami Consulting Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
No experience required, must be good in English
Intresting opportunity to work w Medical Tourism
Be part of small team in quickly growing industryCompany: Azami Medical

Location: Work from home in Bangkok

Job Type: Full-time/Part time

About us

Azami Medical is a leading medical tourism agency that specializes in providing top-notch medical and healthcare services to international clients visiting Bangkok and other cities in Thailand. We are dedicated to offering a seamless and comfortable experience for our clients seeking medical treatment and wellness services. As we expand our operations, we are seeking highly organized and detail-oriented Sales and Administrative teammates.

Position Overview

As a Remote Administrative Assistant at Azami Medical, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our agency's operations in Bangkok. You will provide essential administrative support to the team, assist with client communication, and help manage various tasks vital to our clients' medical tourism experience.

Key Responsibilities

Client Communication
Serve as the first point of contact for client inquiries and requests, providing exceptional customer service.
Respond to client emails, phone calls, and messages promptly and professionally.
Assist in coordinating clients' appointments, transportation, and accommodation bookings.
Documentation and Record-Keeping
Maintain organized records of client information, medical records, and appointments.
Ensure all client documentation is complete and up-to-date.
Scheduling and Calendar Management
Assist in scheduling appointments for clients, healthcare providers, and medical procedures.
Manage the team's calendar and coordinate meetings and appointments.
Administrative Support
Handle general administrative tasks such as data entry, filing, and other office-related duties.
Prepare and distribute reports and documents as needed.
Assist with logistics and planning for client visits to Bangkok.
Collaboration
Work closely with the hospital and clinic teams to facilitate effective communication and ensure efficient workflows.
 Assist in coordinating team meetings, evaluating processes, and following up on action items.
Social Media Management
Maintain and update the company's social media accounts, including Facebook and Instagram, with engaging content related to medical tourism, healthcare trends, and client success stories.
Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries on social media platforms in a timely and professional manner.

Qualifications

Previous sales experience is preferred, especially in a remote work setting.
Excellent communication in English and interpersonal skills is a must.
Proficiency in using email, chat platforms, and office productivity software.
Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize work effectively.
Knowledge of the medical and healthcare industry is a plus.
Self-motivated and capable of working independently while maintaining a high level of productivity.
Familiarity with the healthcare facilities and services in Bangkok is an advantage.
Experience with social media marketing is a plus.

Benefits:

Fixed salary, plus performance-based bonuses.
Chance to grow and advance career in quickly developing industry.
Opportunity to work from home in Bangkok often.
Contribution to the growth of a reputable medical tourism agency.
Training and professional development opportunities.
The chance to make a meaningful impact on clients' healthcare experiences in Bangkok.undefined

Commercialization ManagerFrieslandCampina (Thailand) PCL.Job Highlights
High level of competence within project management
Innovation within Consumer Dairy
preferable in an operational supply chainScope of work

This job contributes to FrieslandCampina’s success by ensuring the high level of competence within project management in the Commercialization team of Customer SC FrieslandCampina Thailand. With Commercialization we support our Fighting Units and customer to introduce new products/ideas as fast as possible with the highest quality as possible. Our purpose is to manage and implement changes and innovation within Consumer Dairy and customer by being a Supply Chain Expertise Centre and creating a customer oriented Supply Chain Footprint.  

The project manager facilitates in efficient and effective execution of projects for Fighting Unit FrieslandCampina Thailand achieving the Consumer Dairy FrieslandCampina Thailand Strategy.

Responsibilities

 Project Management

Project leader of multiple FrieslandCampina Thailand medium/large size projects (e.g. NPD, Tenders, New market out-roll, Local Redesigns, Local Contingency projects, Local CAPEX as part of Innovation projects, saving relate with recipe, import product); Front to End (Idea to Implementation)
Project initiation & orientation; identifies and collects ideas, business requirements and needs, defines the scope of the project, determines the feasibility by building a business case and defines project objectives within agreed project management guidelines
Project design & plan; formulates the project plan (including resourcing, planning, risk mitigation, quality control and organizational requirements), determines budget and acquires approval, in line with project objectives
Project preparation & execution; executes project, coordinates the activities of the project team members, monitors progress of project and compliance with the project plan (using the project controls: Time, Money, Quality, Information, Organisation and Risks), manages and mitigates project risks and resources, creates risk awareness among stakeholders, manages stage-gates and adjusts project plan when necessary
Project closure & implementation; delivers the project in line with project objectives, budget and planning, discusses project results with business, hands over project to line management when necessary and evaluates the project with all involved stakeholders

Risk & Stakeholder Management

Creates support for complete project approach (objectives, planning etc.), updates and consults relevant stakeholders regularly, manages expectations of relevant stakeholders during execution, involves stakeholders in decision making and builds and maintains a network of relevant stakeholders 

Information & Communication

Ensures periodical project management reporting, quantitative and qualitative, according to defined formats and project management guidelines (e.g. maintaining Principal Toolbox, Props for saving)

People Management

Functionally leads, coaches, develops members of the own project team, and gives input for appraisal

Continuous Improvement

Keeps up with relevant project management methods and techniques and optimizes the implementation of and support for these at FrieslandCampina Consumer Dairy

Project Portfolio Management

Driving the process for the project portfolio management; creating the overview, gather the input, analyses and propose.

Deployment Excellence activities

Analyze, evaluate and drive commercialization related continuous improvement initiatives.

Strategic Portfolio Management

Drive the structural portfolio review process for the FU
Management of portfolio guidelines
Follow up on product life cycle management
Identification of value engineering initiatives

End-to-End Supply Chain solutions for innovations

Central point of contact of SC of a specific plant for all FU driven projects.
Executes feasibility checks on capabilities, complexity and capacity for local managed projects.
Lead SKU Rationalization

Qualifications

MSc / MA / MBA Degree
Bachelor’s Degree or above or equivalent experience.
Excellent in Project Management with a minimum of 6 years of project management experience
Minimum of 3 years of work experience in the FMCG industry, preferable in an operational supply chain/manufacturing environment
Fluently in Thai and English written and spoken.
Demonstrate a strong understanding of project management and supply chain processes are preferred.
Excellent skills in using office software e.g. MS project, PPT, Excel, Power BI

Location: This position will be base at FrieslandCampina, Head officeundefined

Library AssistantKing's College International School BangkokJob Highlights
Checking-in, checking-out, sort books, etc.
Manage library data, materials and reports
Assisting with library events and reading sessionsThe Post

We are looking for a well-qualified assistant to set up the library and help make it the centre of our school. They will also support whole-school literacy events and have a role in delivering extra-curricular activities with the librarian, library lessons for the students as well parent workshops to engage the wider King’s community.

If you have a kind heart, a drive to help us become one of the best schools in Asia and a vision for drama as an enabling force in education, we would like to hear from you. If you value colleagues who will support you, are excited by a start-up environment in which we all work hard for each other and have a nurturing approach to education, we would welcome you to apply for a position with us.

The setting-up environment has a large number of opportunities for the right candidate as you will be involved with designing and implementing a library system. 

If you value colleagues who will support you, you are excited by a start-up environment in which we all work hard for each other, and if you have a nurturing approach to education we would welcome you to apply for a position with us.

Responsibilities


Assist Librarian in checking-in, checking-out, sort books, publications, and other items according to established procedure and return them to shelves, files, or other designated storage areas.
Assist students and parents in registration and transaction activities.
Manage library data, materials and reports.
Assist staffs in collecting, preparing, and organizing library materials.
Assist readers in finding books and help students and faculties in research problems and reference questions.
Maintain library clean, safe and organized.
Maintain safeguarding environment for students.
Organise book talks, multimedia programs, exhibits, and displays.
Organise the library inventory, perform stock checks, and prepare item list for removal, relocation and binding.
Process new books, maintain circulation records and make reserves on requested books.
Manage serial collection and acquisition of new library materials.
Perform routine maintenances of library equipment.
Assisting with library events and reading sessions.
Qualifications

To demonstrate our values, especially kindness, good manners and wisdom.
 A bachelor’s degree or equivalent.
Good English and Thai oracy and literacy.
Good numeracy skills
The ability to work well as part of a team.
A friendly, professional and approachable manner with colleagues, students and parents.
To understand the requirement to maintain confidentiality between colleagues, students and parents.
Competent ICT skills.

Important Note:

King’s College International School Bangkok is fully committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and expects all staff to share this commitment. Any offer of employment will be subject to the receipt of an enhanced DBS disclosure/ICPC, a criminal records check, suitably translated if you teach outside of the UK, satisfactory references, and medical clearance.undefined

Owned by the Federal Republic of Germany, the organization operates as a private-sector enterprise with a development policy mandate to make sustainable improvements to the living conditions of people in the countries we operate in. GIZ has a record of more than 60 years of working experience in Thailand. 

The Thailand component of the global project “Introducing Measures, Pathways and Roadmaps for Optimizing Vehicle Efficiency and Electrification (IMPROVE)”, commissioned by the German Federal Ministry for the Environment, Nature Conservation, Nuclear Safety and Consumer Protection (BMUV) and implemented by GIZ Thailand, is currently looking for an Intern.

INTERN (IMPROVE)

The transport sector is responsible for around one-quarter of global energy-related greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions. Emissions are rising sharply, especially in road transport in non-OECD countries, due to a corresponding increase in the number of vehicles combined with insufficient regulatory restrictions: Only a few countries have energy efficiency standards and sustainable alternative fuel strategies. Ambitious regulatory frameworks are therefore needed to curb transport emissions and foster the transition to electric mobility. The IMPROVE project seeks to address this gap in a targeted manner in Thailand, Colombia, Kenya, and Morocco. The project also contributes to the regional and global dissemination of lessons learned.

The development of Thailand’s transport sector is characterized by high and continuously rising car and motorcycle ownership across the Kingdom, particularly within cities and urban agglomerations. Higher dependency on private car uses together with comparably low utilization of public transport lead to notoriously high congestion and prevalent negative externalities from mainly fossil fuel-based urban mobility. Aged, high-polluting diesel vehicles are a major GHG emissions source and further contribute to 70% of ambient air pollution. Even though Thailand has several fuel efficiency and emission mitigation instruments in place or planned for implementation, EV promotion still needs to be underpinned or integrated into the existing regulative policy framework. Moreover, with the ambitious target of Nationally Determined Contributions (NDCs) announced at COP 26, Thailand will have to revise and further develop existing instruments and bring into action additional policies and measures to achieve the challenging targets. The IMPROVE project will provide technical assistance to support the preparation of ambitious regulations, taxation measures related to vehicles and fuels and advance the existing regulative framework to improve EV enhancement in Thailand.

 The Intern will carry out the following tasks:

Assist in the research of relevant information for the project in both Thai and English languages (incl. translation of documents)
Assist in the development of presentations, visualization materials and other knowledge products and knowledge-sharing activities in both Thai and English language
Assist in preparing administrative management of project events such as trainings, workshops, meetings, etc.
Assist in the interactive execution of project virtual and physical events
Assist in the development of presentations, visualization materials and other knowledge products and knowledge-sharing activities in both Thai and English language
Assist in the preparation of communication and PR content such as newsletters, articles, and social media posts in both Thai and English language (incl. translation of documents)
Other relevant tasks assigned by the project team

Applicants are not required to have professional work experience but are encouraged to list all relevant work experiences in their application, as well as interests, skills and knowledge. To qualify for an internship with the TGC EMC project, the following conditions should be met:

Master/ Senior bachelor's students in sustainable development, transport engineering, public or development policy, or related fields.
Excellent writing and editing skills in both Thai and English in which key message is clearly identified and presented nicely in a logical way
Strong interest in sustainable development, climate change, electric mobility and / or transport-related topics
Excellent command of MS Office package (Word, Excel and PowerPoint)
Fluency in English and Thai (written and spoken) is required.
Good communication and social skills.
Personal attributes and competencies:
Self-motivated, flexible and resourceful
Good organizational and conceptualization skill
Hands-on mentality and detail-oriented work ethics
Ability to work independently and in a team
Ability to work under time pressure and meet deadlines with strong attention to consistency, detail, and quality
Interest and desire to work in a cross-cultural context, climate change adaptation and sustainable agriculture value chains.

Duty station and timeframe:

The intern will be based in Bangkok. The internship duration is 4 to 6 months. The selected candidate is expected to start in as soon as possible. This position is a remunerated internship.

Please submit your cover letter and CV via "Apply Now". The deadline for application is 15 December 2023. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

GIZ Thailand is an equal opportunity employer and actively encourages gender diversity within the company and operations.

Secretary/เลขานุการChild of the Universe co.,tldJob Highlights
มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 2 ปี
มนุษยสัมพันธ์ การสื่อสาร และภาษาอังกฤษดี
บริหารจัดการงานต่างๆ (Prioritizing and organizing)ตำแหน่ง secretary

เงินเดือน : ตามประสบการณ์

Job Description

ติดตามผู้บริหาร วางคิวงานต่างๆ จดบันทึกการประชุม ประสานงานทั่วไป
รวบรวมสรุปงานจากแต่ละส่วนงานและรายงานตรงกับผู้บริหาร
ค้นหาข้อมูลตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บริหารรวมถึงนำเสนอไอเดียเบื้องต้นเพื่อเป็นทางเลือกในการตัดสินใจของผู้บริหาร
ช่วยดูแลภาพรวมของแต่ละโปรเจคในเครือ
จัดการและแก้ปัญหาให้งานบรรลุเป้าหมายตามที่ตั้งไว้
ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่างๆทั้งภายในองค์กรและภายนอกองค์กร
ดูแลความเรียบร้อย ทั้งในเนื้องานของผู้บริหาร
งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บริหาร

Job Requirement

มีความสามารถในการบริหารจัดการงานต่างๆได้ดีมาก (Prioritizing and organizing)
วุฒิการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี สาขาบริหารธุรกิจ หรือ สาขาอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง
มีประสบการณ์ทำงานด้านเลขาอย่างน้อย 2 ปี
มีบุคลิกภาพดี มีรสนิยม วางตัวเหมาะสมกับกาลเทศะ
มีทักษะการสื่อสารดี รู้จักการใช้ภาษาที่เหมาะสม
มีความขยัน พร้อมเรียนรู้ และ ลุยทุกสถานการณ์
สามารถแก้ไขสถานการณ์เฉพาะหน้าได้ดี
มีความคล่องตัว ทำงานรวดเร็ว รักงานบริการ
สามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้ดี
มีความรับผิดชอบสูง ติดตามงาน และส่งมอบงานภายในระยะเวลาที่กำหนด
มีทัศนคติเชิงบวกในการทำงาน
สามารถทำงานภายใต้สภาวะกดดันได้
ไม่มีภาระที่ส่งผลกับงาน
สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ในระดับดี
ทำงาน : จันทร์ - ศุกร์ เวลา 10:00 - 18:00 น.
วันหยุด : เสาร์ - อาทิตย์ วันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ 13 วัน/ปี
สวัสดิการ : ประกันสังคม, วันลากิจ, วันลาป่วย ฯลฯ
สถานที่ทำงาน : ปิ่นเกล้าundefined

Customer Care CoordinatorRed Sky Digital Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
New, exciting international business opportunity
Premium office location
Attractive package, benefits offeredJob Overview:

BLK Assistance is establishing a new business unit here in Bangkok (part of Healthcase Services LLC operating in the USA). We are looking for dynamic new team members, seeking a fresh challenge. 

This role requires communication between our clients and members, medical providers. The customer care coordinator is to coordinate treatment and provide authorizations/issue Guarantee of Payments for our members worldwide. Respond to inquiries pertaining to authorizations and documentation requirements as well as answer inbound telephone calls and emails pertaining to travel, medical and concierge assistance.

Summary of Primary Job Responsibilities:

Initiate cases for customers experiencing medical emergencies while traveling away from home or expatriates.
Collaborate with and assist supporting all parties to ensure the customer receives the highest level of service during their time of need.
Respond to claims inquiries from customers, members, clients and/or providers.
Check eligibility of the insured members; check premium status for individual clients; verify eligibility of expenses per policy requirements and guidelines.
Tracking and follow up of ongoing cases in the Asia Pacific ensuring appropriate follow up with the medical providers and corresponding networks
Provide guidance, support and advice to international members seeking medical treatments or procedures
Data entry of claims and invoices diligently and accurately into the in-house computer system. • Escalate customer concerns/issues to management for resolution if all other means of satisfying the customer have been exhausted.
Stay up-to-date on procedural changes in order to communicate accurate information to customers.
Provide language support for international travelers and expatriates both written and oral (requires fluency in Thai/English/Other Languages also Helpful)
Build and maintain effective relationships with colleagues

Typical Qualifications:

Skills:

A motivated and enthusiastic personality.
Positive attitude with profound knowledge of customer support.
Excellent communication skills, verbal and written.
Self-organized, the ability to plan and prioritize tasks
Effective decision making
Able to quickly gain knowledge of management information systems and reporting requirements

Knowledge/Abilities:

Customer care coordinators provide real time support and assistance to travelers and expatriates. These needs could routinely include requests for replacement medications lost in travel, finding an appropriate medical facility, or could involve more complex situations such as specialized medical evacuations. As well as functioning as an emergency liaison between a traveler’s/expat family and medical providers. Key qualities that we are seeking include some previous telephone service experience, general knowledge of world geography, solid critical thinking skills and an ability to effectively manage and prioritize tasks. Some familiarity with medical terminology as well as foreign language abilities are highly valued.

Key requirements/ Experience

Associate's degree in a related field or equivalent combination of education and experience.
Two (2) years’ experience in customer service environment.
International experience is required.
Bilingual Thai/English
Ability to work within a team environment and independently
Previous insurance experience would be a definite asset
Ability to communicate effectively and professionally in English verbal and written

Office Engineer/วิศวกรสำนักงานRichy Place 2002 Public Company LimitedJob Highlights
รับผิดชอบจัดทำ BOQ
รับผิดชอบเข้าสุ่มตรวจสอบคุณภาพก่อสร้าง
ตรวจสอบแบบงานก่อสร้างโครงการต่างๆ ให้สอดคล้อง

รับผิดชอบจัดทำเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการจัดซื้อ จัดจ้าง (LOI,TOR,สัญญา,PR) และดำเนินการจัดหาผู้รับจ้างต่าง ๆ
รับผิดชอบรวบรวมแบบก่อสร้างและเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องในการดำเนินการจัดจ้าง,จ้างเหมา เพื่อจัดเก็บหรือแจกจ่ายให้กับผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องไปปฏิบัติงาน
รับผิดชอบตรวจสอบความถูกต้องแบบก่อสร้างโครงการต่างๆ ก่อนจะนำไปใช้ในการก่อสร้าง
รับผิดชอบตรวจสอบแบบงานก่อสร้างโครงการต่างๆ ให้สอดคล้องกับนโยบายบริษัท
รับผิดชอบจัดทำ BOQ เพื่อจัดทำงบประมาณ รวมถึงตรวจสอบราคา Defect และงานซ่อมเพื่อจัดจ้าง
รับผิดชอบประสานงานกับทุกฝ่ายที่เกี่ยวข้องกับโครงการต่างๆ ตั้งแต่เริ่มศึกษาโครงการจนโครงการแล้วเสร็จ เช่น การขอใช้น้ำประปา,ไฟฟ้า.โทรศัพท์,การขออนุญาตต่างๆ และงานอื่นๆ ให้สอดคล้องกับงานก่อสร้างและความต้องการของฝ่ายต่างๆ
รับผิดชอบรายงานความก้าวหน้าและความคืบหน้าของการประสานงานกับผู้บังคับบัญชา
รับผิดชอบการร่วมกิจกรรมของบริษัทและงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย
รับผิดชอบประสานงานกับบุคคลภายนอก ลูกค้า ที่เกี่ยวข้องโครงการต่างๆในการเข้าให้บริการเป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพสมบูรณ์ตามระบบที่กำหนดและทันกำหนดเวลา หรือความต้องการบุคคลภายนอก,ลูกค้า
รับผิดชอบให้ข้อเสนอแนะด้านการให้บริการของโครงการต่างๆ ที่เป็นประโยชน์ต่อบริษัท
รับผิดชอบเข้าสุ่มตรวจสอบคุณภาพก่อสร้าง (QC) ,ความปลอดภัยในการก่อสร้าง รวมถึงการใช้เอกสารควบคุมต่างๆ ,ติดตามทำรายงานซ่อม, ส่งมอบ
รับผิดชอบให้ข้อเสนอแนะถึง นวัตกรรมใหม่ เพื่อนำมาใช้สำหรับ
ลดระยะเวลาหรือต้นทุนงานก่อสร้างundefined

Procurement OfficerAura Bangkok Clinic Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Strong negotiation skills
Understanding of purchasing processes and policies
Purchasing experience is an advantageOverall values:

Passionate in Aura. Strong passion in bringing a high-quality medical service to everyone at a reasonable price.
Lead, inspire and motivate team member to always stay in a fast-paced, revenue-driven work environment.
Always analyze and optimize on-the-go. We are bringing the aesthetic industry towards a new break through, there will be many obstacles. Persevere through all of them.
Advice and coach team member. We value high-growth employees and reward them handsomely. Evaluate and give constructive feedback your team member to support her high-growth career path.
Excellent presentation skill with strong logical thinking. 
Excellent management skill. Always plan ahead. Always have backup plan. Strong can-do attitude.
Always strive only for the best. Always go beyond expectation. Always set an almost impossible goal. Never settle for an easy one.

Purpose of the position:

To operate purchasing operations and ensure that all procurement activities are carried out in accordance with the company's policies and regulations.

Key Responsibilities:


Coordinate with other teams on goods and services details that all teams request correctly.

Sourcing new vendors and negotiate for suitable price, credit term and a reasonable delivered date.

Create PR/PO and receive goods on TR cloud.

Track the status of the delivery date to be on time.

Check the product at the head office before deliver to the recipient.

Coordinate the delivery date with the recipient. In the case of delivery outside the head office.

Submit documents related to payment and purchase to the Finance team.

Manage eligible products Fixed Asset on TR Cloud.


Key Qualifications & Skills:
Bachelor's Degree in business administration, supply chain management, or a related field.

Public Relations & Sales Associate Specialist - Hospitality (Contracts 3 months)The Thai Silk Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Promote the Jim Thompson Heritage Quarter
Sales Strategy,Public Relations,CRM
Competitive salary and performance-based incentive               As a Sales Associate & PR Specialist in the hospitality sector, you will play a pivotal role in driving sales and public relations activities for our Hospitality department in Thailand. This position demands a dynamic, customer-focused individual with a passion for promoting our hospitality business. The Sales Associate & PR Specialist will be mainly responsible for visiting hotels and potential partners in Bangkok and Thailand, meeting with GMs, EAMs, sales representatives, butlers, and others to promote Jim Thompson Hospitality, with the mission of raising awareness and increasing traffic to our facilities. This position will be a brand ambassador and needs to be knowledgeable about all the food and beverage offerings at our hospitality department.

Key Responsibilities:

Sales Strategy:

Develop and execute an agenda for visiting the top hotels in Thailand to present our Jim Thompson Hospitality Sales Kit and project. This strategy should be completed within the three-month contract and will be coordinated with our marketing and hospitality management team.

Customer Relationship Management:

Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients, ensuring exceptional customer service. Act as the brand ambassador and provide customers with the right information.

Hospitality Promotion:

Promote our Jim Thompson Heritage Quarter outlets to hotels and prospective clients, travel agencies, corporate partners, and individual travelers. Create an agenda and ensure that we collect a database for sending information to potential customers.

Market Research:

Stay updated on market trends, competitive intelligence, and customer preferences to identify growth opportunities. Create a visit schedule over the three months, focusing on 5-star hotels and travel agencies across the country.

Public Relations:

Manage and enhance the Jim Thompson Hospitality public image through various PR activities and community engagement.

Sales Presentations:

Create compelling sales presentations and proposals to showcase the unique selling points of our Hospitality department.

Collaboration:

Work closely with the marketing, events, and operations teams to ensure a coordinated approach to hospitality sales.

Negotiation:

Coordinate with our sales and marketing team for possible negotiations with different potential hotels and partners.

Reporting: Maintain detailed records of sales activities, customer interactions, and market feedback. Generate regular reports to track progress.

Networking:

Attend industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to increase brand visibility and identify potential business partners.


Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in hospitality, business, or a related field.
Proven experience in sales, public relations, or a similar role within the hospitality industry.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Results-oriented, with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
Proficiency in MS Office applications and CRM software.
Excellent organizational and time management skills.
Knowledge of the local and regional hospitality market.
Fluency in English and Thai, both written and spoken.
Willingness to travel during the three-month contract period, covering various locations in Thailand.

Benefits:

Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
Health and wellness benefits.
Travel and hotel accommodation during work-related travel.
Interested candidates should apply with your updated resume via JobsDB Apply or contact Jim Thompson Talent Acquisition Team at 02 700 2000 ext.2909undefined

Industrial Engineer (New Plant in Rayong)EssilorLuxotticaJob Highlights
Experience in Warehouse and Logistics operation
Project management experience
Drawing & design production flow managementNice to know

A Logistics Engineer is a professional who is responsible for designing, developing, and implementing systems that optimize all aspects of the logistics process. Logistics Engineers analyze data and processes to identify areas for improvement and develop plans to increase efficiency, reduce waste, and improve quality. They work closely with the operator and supervisor to ensure that logistics processes are running smoothly and efficiently. Logistics Engineers is required to have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as excellent communication and interpersonal skills. They should also have a solid understanding of logistics processes, planning, and quality control.

My day at EssilorLuxottica

Monitor and evaluate logistics process performance, identifying areas for improvement. Tracking key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure productivity, accuracy, and efficiency and able to defined gaps/variation with action plan.
Manage, Control, Analyze and improve all logistics process in order to achieve target / KPI as planned.
Manage usage of company resource to be more proper and efficiency (man, material, machine, methodology and money)
Implement and maintain effective of logistics operation to ensure all the process are efficiency.
Standardization of new business flow and execution implementation alignment with Operational team.
Analyzing physical and system flows and envision, propose and deploy improvement actions to increase operations smoothness, speediness and flexibility.

Must have

Bachelor’s degree in Logistics, Industrial Engineer or related fields.
At least 3 years of experience in Warehouse and Logistics operation, Project management is preferable.
Excellent command of both written and spoken English
Good knowledge of MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and SAP background.
Have experience to drawing and design production flow and process management.
Good diagnostic, planning and problem-solving skills.
Extensive communication skills and People collaboration is must.
Systematic thinking, good analytics, self-motivation and highly responsibility.undefined

HR STAFF / Admin STAFF ทำงาน5วัน/เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายบุคคล (รับด่วน)Berlin Pharmaceutical Industry Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
มีประสบการณ์ทำงานในแผนกบุคคลหรือเกี่ยวข้อง3-4ปี
ทำงานตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ชอบกิจกรรมติดต่อประสานงาน
ยิ้มแย้มแจ่มใส ทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ดีบริษัทฯ ต้องการเจ้าหน้าที่ทรัพยากรบุคคลเพื่อสนันสนุน และทำหน้าที่คอยให้คำปรึกษาหรือข้อสงสัยแก่พนักงานในด้านต่างๆภายในองค์กร รับด่วนพร้อมสัมภาษณ์งานทันที

รายละเอียดงานและหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ :

- เก็บบันทึกข้อมูลพนักงาน รายละเอียดพนักงาน 
- เตรียมเอกสาร เช่น สัญญาจ้างพนักงานงานใหม่ อบรมพนักงานใหม่ การลงเครื่องบันทึกเวลา(สแกนนิ้ว)
- ให้ข้อมูลพนักงานเกี่ยวกับประกันสังคม การขอเอกสารใบลา การขอหนังสือรับรองต่างๆ
- จัดทำแบบฟอร์มสำหรับเบิกค่าใช้จ่ายในแผนก
- ดูแลแม่บ้าน แจ้งซ่อม ติดต่อช่างอาคาร การประสานงานแจ้งดูแลเครื่องตามระบบ
- โพสต์หาตำแหน่งงานว่าง ติดต่อนัดหมายผู้สมัครงาน 
-  บริหารงานด้านเอกสารต่างๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ติดต่อประสานงานภายในและภายนอกองค์กร เช่น สำนักงานประกันสังคม กรมสรรพากร ฯลฯ
- จัดทำเอกสารประเมินการทำงาน  ตรวจสอบเวลาทำงาน การบันทึกการลางาน
- ดูแลสิทธิประโยชน์ และสวัสดิการต่างๆของพนักงาน รวมถึงประชาสัมพันธ์ข่าวสารต่างๆให้พนักงาน

​

คุณสมบัติ : 

-มีประสบการณ์ในตำแหน่งเจ้าหน้าที่ทรัพยากรบุคคล ธุรการ หรือตำแหน่งที่เกี่ยวข้อง
- มีความรู้ความสามารถด้านคอมพิวเตอร์ (โดยเฉพาะโปรแกรม MS Office)
- มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับประกันสังคม หรือ ข้อมูลต่างๆมาบ้าง
- มีทักษะการบริหารการจัดการองค์กรที่ดีและมีความสามารถในการจัดลำดับความสำคัญของงาน 
- มีทักษะการสื่อสารทางโทรศัพท์ email และการพูดคุยสื่อสารที่ดี
- จบปริญญาตรีในสาขาทรัพยากรบุคคลหรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง 
- ชอบการประสานงาน บุคลิกดี ยิ้มแย้มแจ่มใส

รายละเอียดอื่น : 
สถานที่ทำงาน : บริษัท เบอร์ลินฟาร์มาซูติคอลอินดัสตรี้ จำกัด (ออฟฟิศ)
อาคารชัยสงวน 2 ชั้น 2 ถนนเพชรบุรีตัดใหม่ (อยู่ระหว่างซอยเพชรบุรี41-43) 
เดินทางด้วยรถใต้ดินออกสถานีเพชรบุรี และเดิน หรือ นั่งวินมอเตอร์ไซด์

Retail Marketing Manager or Assistant Manager
Retail Marketing,channel marketing,trade marketing
Strong analytical skills with high creativityJob Description:


       This function aims to improve our in-channel execution and our ability to overlay localized Retail/ Social Retailing programs onto the standard Product Marketing activity (e.g., Events, Promo, Merchandising, Distortion, Trade)
       Responsible for customized retail marketing for each Channel (FSS/DS/SMC/Online) with different development of channel specific calendars and programs; including areas such as merchandising, promotions, and events.  Build Omni-Channel building block
       Owns, develops, coordinates and cascades a tool-kit of in-store promotional activities, in-store program development and execution to Sales and in store artists
       Develops differentiated calendars and plans/forecasts programs (merchandising, events, promotions) relevant to executional requirements and consumer target audience (CRM data) and retailer campaign for each respective channel and outlets
       Creates different business models to win in every channel.
       Monitors results and channel competitiveness to ensure Brand executional excellence in next program 
       Focus on events both off and in store events including on counter activities, workshops with selected partners
       Deal and work with retailers, suppliers, organizers and work closely with team both product mkt, training, Communications team and sales team
       Focus on Omni-channel experiences and campaigns
       Handling VM (collateral or tester units), forecast and allocate samples, testers and counter supplies are sufficient
       Develop and organize retail activities with purpose of driving new customers acquisition and reason to visit B&M store such as activation supporting local moments, negotiate in store media support, retailer social media support
       Monitor market retail trend and competitors to identify opportunities and learning analysis

Qualifications:

       Master's or Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration or related fields
       Minimum 5 years working experience with 3 years in Category Management / Retail Operations / Retail Marketing / Sales at Manager level.
       Experience in Luxury Retail Marketing and / or FMCG is a plus.
       Enthusiastic / proactive / flexible.
       Strong business acumen.
       Persuasive but collaborative working attitude.
       Proven ability to provide guidance, instruction and training.
       Proven exceptional ability in driving sales, organizational skills, customer service.
       Management experience and strong influencing skills essential.

Admin. Tracking/เจ้าหน้าที่ประสานงานศูนย์บริการ/ เจ้าหน้าที่แผนกปฏิบัติการ/ ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการศูนย์บริการInsuwan Technical Services Company LimitedJob Highlights
เจ้าหน้าที่ประสานงานศูนย์บริการ
เจ้าหน้าที่แผนกปฏิบัติการ
ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการศูนย์บริการJob Description (รายละเอียดงานโดยสังเขป) :

ติดต่อประสานงานทั่วไปทั้งภายในและภายนอกองค์กร  
กดรับงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายจาก บริษัท ไทยซัมซุง อิเลคทรอนิกส์ จำกัด -  SAMSUNG โดยระบบ GSPN ตามระบบการทำงานมาตรฐานของศูนย์บริการ SAMSUNG
ดูแลแผนการทำงานและตารางการนัดหมายลูกค้า ติดต่อลูกค้าเพื่อยืนยันการนัดหมายและสื่อสารรายละเอียดการทำงานที่จำเป็น (Queue Planner)
ติดต่อประสานงาน สอบถามปัญหาและรายละเอียดความต้องการในการเข้าให้บริการจากลูกค้าเบื้องต้น (Triage Call) และประสานงานทำงานร่วมกับทีมงานช่างบริการในการแก้ไขปัญหาให้กับลูกค้า
ประสานงานทำงานร่วมกับ Sales Coordinator / Project Coordinator เพื่อจัดทำใบเสนอราคาให้กับลูกค้า
ประสานงานทำงานร่วมกับ Parts Controller เพื่อจัดหา และจัดเตรียมอะไหล่ในการเข้าให้บริการลูกค้าได้อย่างถูกต้องครบถ้วน ทันเวลา
อัพเดทสถานะการทำงานประจำวัน พร้อมทั้งรายงานปัญหาและสรุปผลการทำงานประจำวัน/ ประจำสัปดาห์/ ประจำเดือน ให้กับผู้จัดการศูนย์บริการ ผู้บริหาร และลูกค้า และ/ หรือผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องทราบ
ตรวจสอบและติดตามกระบวนการการทำงานของทีมช่างบริการรายวัน เพื่อให้มั่นใจว่าการทำงานเป็นไปตามวิธีการและมาตรฐานการทำงานของศูนย์บริการ SAMSUNG และตาม SOP ที่กำหนด
ปิดงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายประจำวัน (งานที่เสร็จเรียบร้อย) ผ่านทางระบบ GSPN ตามระบบการทำงานมาตรฐานของศูนย์บริการ SAMSUNG

Qualification (คุณสมบัติ) :

การศึกษาวุฒิปริญญาตรีหรือเทียบเท่า สาขาการเงิน การบัญชี  บริหารธุรกิจ การจัดการ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง
มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ มีความรับผิดชอบสูง
มีปฎิภาณไหวพริบ และสามารถแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี
สามารถใช้ Microsoft Office เช่น Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook และอื่นๆ ได้
มีประสบการณ์การทำงานไม่น้อยกว่า 1 ปี
ขยัน อดทน รักงานบริการและชอบเรียนรู้

QA Officer (Finish Goods)Kerry Ingredients (Thailand) Ltd.Job Highlights
More than 26,000 people have careers with Kerry
Positive and challenging work environment
We are dedicated to Safety First, Quality AlwaysAbout the role

As a Quality Assurance Officer at our Kerry Manufacturing Plant in Bangpoo, Thailand, your primary responsibility will be to support the testing and analysis of our products before release, ensuring that they meet the highest quality standards. You will play a crucial role in maintaining the integrity of our product line and contribute to our commitment to delivering exceptional products to our customers.

Key responsibilities
Perform routine quality assurance tasks as outlined in the Quality Policies Manual and associated procedures and work instructions, including but not limited to:
Finished products routine testing
Document verification that related with finished products.
Non-Conformances are raised and hold/blocked in SAP system
Maintain the record/document system of Finished products.
Positive release / transfer stock or monitoring program of Finished product.
Support with the Finished products part for customer complaint investigation / traceability / mock recall
Collect and retain retention sample of Finished products. 
Support internal testing Finished products for extended shelf life / NPI / Project.
Ensure that Laboratory and equipment are kept clean and tidy
Daily calibration of equipment before testing
Support Internal /External quality system audit.
Support site HACCP team.
Support as assignment from Quality Manager / Assistance QA manager /QA Supervisor 
Qualifications and skills
Diploma or Degree in Food Science or relevant laboratory and/or Industry experience
Minimum 1 years’ experience in a similar role in food manufacturing environment
Appropriate experience in food testing in food laboratories.
Working knowledge of the Microsoft Office Suite.
Able to work independently and proactively, and make appropriate decision with limited resources during night shift
Organized and pay strong attention to details
Ability to meet deadlines, self-managed and ability to handle multiple tasks with speed and high accuracyundefined

Supporting the learner in developing social skills both in and out of the classroom
Supporting the use of ICT in learning activities and with specific programs to support learning
Providing regular feedback on the learner’s learning and behavior to the Learning Designer and Student Success Team, including feedback on the effectiveness of the behavior strategies adopted
When working with a group of learners, understanding and using group dynamics to promote group effectiveness and support group and individual performance
Knowing and applying school policies on Child Protection, Safeguarding, Health and Safety, Behaviour, Teaching, and Learning
To be aware of confidential issues linked to home/learner/Learning Designer/school
Contributing towards reviews of the learner’s progress as appropriate
Complying with legal and organizational requirements for maintaining the health, safety, and security of yourself and others in the learning environment
Taking part in training activities offered by the school to further knowledge and skills of working with a child with specific learning difficulties                                                 


The successful candidate will be likely to fit the following profile:

Qualifications:

Higher diploma or above
Experience working with special needs children preferable

 Skills:

Good communication skills in English and Thai (Speaking, Listening, Reading, and Writing)
Good organizational and IT skills

Experience:

Previous experience in a similar role is preferred but not essential
Experience in collaborating with colleagues

Personal Qualities:

Native English speaker or near-native English speaker
High levels of personal and professional integrity
Ability to exercise discretion and confidentiality
Personal warmth to gain the confidence of learners, staff, and parents
Positive rapport with learners
High standards of personal presence and presentation and attention to detail

Attitudes:

A team player with leadership qualities and a reflective and flexible approach
Organized, energetic, positive, and able to self-direct
A positive, enthusiastic, and energetic approach to life
Ability to think creatively and imaginatively
High expectations for learner attainment, personal development, and conduct
Committed to professional development and show a willingness to undertake appropriate training as required

VERSO International School is committed to child protection and welfare of the children. Safeguarding procedures will be enforced to recruitment and hiring process.undefined

Excellent language proficiency in English and Thai

Work as part of administrative & customer serviceTo direct apply for Admissions Administration Officer (Mandarin Speaking), applicants must complete the English language version of the application form

Key Responsibilities:


The Admissions Administration Officer reports directly to Director of Admissions is responsible as part of a team for the effective operation of the school Admissions. In particular, the Admissions Administration Officer  will work as part of the administrative and customer services team having core and shared duties as follows:      

Core duties – Admissions function

To assist the Director of Admissions, who is the line manager, in the proper operation of the Admissions Department including the following tasks and duties

To adopt a “can-help” and friendly approach at all times in dealing with other members of staff, current and prospective parents and visitors
To answer telephone, walk-in and e-mail enquiries concerning entry and application into the school in a timely and friendly manner
To arrange appointments to visit the school and meeting prospective parents
To provide tours to prospective parents and children around the school.
To assist (as necessary) the International Admissions team in communicating with Chinese-speaking clients.
To maintain accurate and up-to-date data concerning enquiries, visits, testing, applications, joining and leaving students on iSAMS, the school’s management information system, and on other databases the school maintains
To work as part of a team to arrange and invigilate the testing of prospective students
To raise standard documentation for students and parents in connection with visa applications, travel requirements and bank account application. 
To deal with other general correspondence relating to the Admissions Department
To carry out the scanning and filing of documents in a timely and accurate manner
To update OPEC's student database
To deal with other ad-hoc duties as and when required, including supporting admissions functions at occassional weekend and evening events such as Pop Up playgroups, Education Fairs and Open Days. Typically there will be around 6 such events throughout any single academic year.
To cross check admission event attendee information against existing enquiries databases and to update those databases accordingly.

Core duties – Customer Services function

To assist with other duties shared with the administrative and customer services teams. The duties will be allocated by the Director of Business Services
To help ensure the procedures for the welcoming of visitors is adhered to in practice
To help maintain a warm, tidy and inviting environment in the administrative area for working and receiving guests and parents
To assist with other administration from time to time
Other ad hoc duties as requested.
Professional Expectations:


Admissions Administration Officer should have the following qualities

Possess at least bachelor degree

At least 3 years work experience in both office-based and customer facing role/s. Experience in a similar school-based role an advantage.
Be a flexible employee capable and willing to work beyond parameters of job descriptions
Have good ICT skills and a willingness to learn. Ideally possessing experience and profiency in using Microsoft Office and Google Suite programmes (particularly spreadsheets).
Be an excellent communicator with staff, students and parents modeling the school paradigm of politeness and courtesy at all times
Have excellent language proficiency (written and spoken) in English and Thai. A good level of spoken Mandarin Chinese would be a distinct advantage.
Be a team player capable of working exceptionally well with all members of the school community and within an admissions team that comprimises both Thai and English-speaking International staff.
Nurture a sense of energy, drive and care with those with whom he / she works closely
Demonstrate excellent attention to detail and precise rigour in database handling
Be an excellent administrator capable of producing work of a high standard
Be known for administrative efficiency and working to set timelines
At all times use his / her best endeavours to promote the interests and reputation of the school
Be tenacious in tackling targets and goals set
Demand and expect the highest standards from those with whom he / she works closely

Proficient in spoken and written English
Good communication and interpersonal abilities

Overall purpose

Oversees the local boutique day to day operations including profitability, inventory management, staff management and customer service excellence. Responsible for ensuring the SOP are adhered to and that the boutiques are at all time in good conditions for operations. Business planning, budgeting, financial management and reporting to management, building and maintaining good rapport with inter-departments and external suppliers, agents and principal are part of the duties of operations manager.


Duties and Responsibilities


 Operational related duties:

Responsible for all day to day operations of all boutiques, including but not limited to manpower planning & control, in-store visual & displays controls and maintenance, housekeeping standards of boutiques and any other day to day operational issues.
Responsible for ensuring smooth operation procedures and close adhere to operations SOP by all boutiques.
To conduct monthly boutique managers’ meeting and boutiques meeting and to ensure all new procedures, practices and updates are communicated and discussed during such meetings.
To conduct shop audit at least twice a week to ensure that the general security systems and procedures are adhered to according to security SOP; to ensure boutiques are operating in good conditions; to ensure that staff presentation & service standards are good; to ensure that general boutique housekeeping & presentations are good, etc
Responsible for all boutiques setup including renovations, new shop setup and any other related issues.
Oversees all Customer Service and related issues, to ensure service standards set are observed by all boutique staff and are strictly adhered to.
Responsible for all customers complaints and service recovery.

Manpower related:

 Ensure all boutiques are sufficiently staff and the duties schedule are plan properly and executed according to in house requirements, such as designated PIC for each boutique is on duty at all times, number of manpower required for operation is adhered too, etc.
To provide next level support to all boutiques in charge for all manpower related issues, such as disciplinary, counseling and motivating of staff, etc.
Responsible for manpower support for all companies events, trainings and any other related activities.

Other duties:



Ensure proper communication is established with all external agents, principals, suppliers and any other related parties.
Build rapport and maintain good working relationships with all external agents, principals, suppliers and any other related parties




Qualifications and Experience

Degree in Business Admin, Operation Management , or related discipline
At least 5-10 years of direct experience
Experience in handling retail stores operations
Good analytical ability, effective presentation skill and leadership traits
Very Good interpersonal and Communications skills
Results oriented and have the ability to exercise judgment within broadly defined requirements in dynamic environment.

Benefits


Health insurance
Bonus (depend on company performance)
Location: BTS Ploenchit

Lifestyle ExecutiveQuintessentially LifestyleJob Highlights
Fluent in English (TOEIC>800, IELT>6.5)
Service-minded with problem-solving skills
New graduates are welcomeQuintessentially Lifestyle is a private members' club with a 24-hour global concierge service, and part of the world's leading luxury lifestyle group. With offices in almost every major destination and thousands of suppliers worldwide, QT Lifestyle is your passport to the very best that life has to offer. Whether it be travel, music, art, food, drink, hotels, clubs, spas, restaurants or – most particularly – service, we are committed to the notion that quality matters. No matter where you are in the world, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, QT Lifestyle is here to help with all your needs, however extraordinary or difficult they may be.

We can not only solve some of your most pressing practical problems (where to find presents in a hurry, a good nanny, the best gym in town) and save you money, we can also help you make the most of your precious time. From front row seats at fashion shows to spur-of-the-moment chartered yachts, impossible-to-book theatre tickets, dinner reservations, film premieres, charity galas and VIP after-parties... You name it; QT Lifestyle can almost certainly sort it.

LIFESTYLE EXECUTIVE

Quintessentially Lifestyle executives handle the lifestyle requests (mostly leisure related) from Quintessentially members – both local and international, help the team solve a lot of problems, co-ordinate with various service providers, take plenty of phone calls, answer questions, offer specialist advice, sell services provided by Quintessentially global group and our affiliated companies.

As a Lifestyle Executive, a typical day might include the following:

researching and arranging travel bookings: itineraries, hotels, flights, cars, etc. for a member
suggesting a gift for a member’s spouse on her birthday
talking to a colleague in another country to arrange a member’s kid to be picked up from a boarding school in that country
helping a colleague to have a three course meal from the member’s favorite restaurant delivered to them within next 2 hours
making restaurant/club reservation for a member
finding the best dermatologist for a member around her office
negotiating with the event organizer for a ticket to a concert which is sold out
brainstorming with colleagues about new ideas for making Quintessentially Lifestyle work better

This job might be for you if:

You enjoy solving problems and helping people
You like learning new things and you can learn quickly
You pay attention to details and think on your feet
You communicate clearly, write well and speak fluently
You are comfortable communicating in writing and on the phone
You like to work in a team
You like to have fun and explore the best life has to offer
You are always confident and cool under pressure
You are a Thai national

It will be awesome if you:

Have background in customer service, personal assistance, concierge or luxury travel and leisure
Working knowledge of luxury travel destinations
Passionate about  gaining knowledge about luxury lifestyle brandsundefined

Industrial Engineer/Industrial EngineerAutoStore Company LimitedJob Highlights
Industrial
Engineering
ProductionAutoStore is seeking a Industrial Engineer for new factory in Thailand

AutoStore is the pioneer of robotic cube storage systems and is constantly evolving as a company. We are changing the way goods and services are stored across the globe, and are pushing borders to increase efficiency, safety and develop new products for our customers.

We are now expanding our production with a new factory in Rayong Provinces Thailand. We are therefore searching for a Industrial Engineer to lead and establish management in Engineering function in our new production facilities in Rayong, Thailand. As Industrial Engineer you will work closely with the Production Manager in setting up the new facilities.

We are Lean, Bold and Transparent - Join the robotic volution with us! 

KEY TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES:



Apply to the strategies, goals, and directions of the Company
Apply to the rules of Thailand Local law
Follow and comply of the Quality Management System (QMS) and the HSE Systems and apply to the rules and regulations set  these systems
Participate in process for new and redesigned products to insure the compatibility of the design and the process capability
Analyze failures which occur in the field and/or in the process to identify and correct root cause problems.
Develop information systems at designated points in the process to provide effective and timely data for analysis of process effectiveness and quick problem detection
Provides the technique and guidance for selecting and implementing the appropriate approach to study the effects of significant factors affecting quality
Takes an active role in stimulating quality and productivity improvement projects through process and equipment changes utilizing proven quality engineering techniques
Design and conduct periodic audits of Industrial Engineering procedures, standard operating procedures, and purchased components to insure compliance with requirements and appropriate specifications
Develop measurement technologies, control strategies, information systems, and manufacturing methods that achieve ambitious specifications at massive production scale
Maintains documentation, equipment and work area in a neat, orderly and safe condition.
In co-operation with the production engineering supervisor and Collaborate with cross -function team in operation of production department area and engineering
Actively support and execute the Company “QDC” philosophy with following priority:
• Q – Quality
• D – Delivery
• C – Cost
       Inform the Production Engineering supervisor and Manager on important issues related to the Production Engineering area
       Ensure that the tools, machines and equipment are kept in good shape and operational at all times
       Ensure that the working area is clean and good looking
       Be an active team member and contribute positively to the accomplishment of the company’s strategies and plans
       Contribute to the efficient implementation of LEAN methodologies within the production department area and engineering.
       Supervisor and Manager may also delegate other tasks fallen within the scope of employee’s job position and competencies, not explicitly written in this document.

KEY QUALIFICATIONS:

       3+ years of experience in Industrial Engineering or related with Engineering.
       Experience working in product development and manufacturing.
       In co-operation with the Production Engineering team establish the strategy and goals for the efficient organization and operation of Production Engineering area
       Develop and maintain the professional routines and processes related to the Production Engineering area
       Direct production support in regard technical aspects of production processes
       Project management experience and an understanding of problem solving system including design of experiments, root cause analysis and statistical analytical.
       Solving production issues together with other production support departments
       Implementing new methods and equipment to support production process.
       Managing technical documentation for production process.
       Have experience to drawing and design production flow and process management.
       Good diagnostic, planning and problem-solving skills.
       Work instruction creation/controller and preparing process of product
       IE tools improvement and introduction
       Measuring and improving Line Balance and producing flow chart
       Process arrangement of mass production for new product
       Introduction of mitigation activities related to production process risk analysis.
       Strong analytical skill, fast learner, independent and highly motivated and work well with given a short lead-time.
       Strong leadership skills with the ability to effectively manage and motivate a team.
       Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities, with keen attention to detail.
       Experience in assembly process will be advantage.
       Good knowledge of MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint)
       Conversation– Good command of both written and spoken English

PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES / Skillset:

 Fluent in both verbal and written English 
Strong work ethic and positive team attitude. 
Extremely detail-oriented and analytical thinking.
Able to interface directly with cross-functional teams. 
Able to develop, review, and maintain metrics and quality audits. 
Ability to manage time. 
Recognize and prioritize quality issues. 

WE OFFER:  

       A creative, safe, and solid workplace in a business experiencing tremendous growth – Norway's first unicorn company listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange

Communications Officer, USAID/Burma Diversity and Inclusion Scholarship Program (Hybrid)Institute of International Education Inc.Job Highlights
Media Relations and Communications
Website and content Management
Excellent interpersonal and communication skillsThe Communications Officer creates, maintains, and updates external communication, resources and print materials for programs managed IIE’s USAID funded Diversity and Inclusion Scholarship Program (DOISP), including website, monthly newsletters, participant publications, social media, and progress reports. The Communications Officer establishes DISPs visibility and coordinates with media circles and partners in planning, implementing, and promoting events with an emphasis on aligning public relations and donor /sponsor relations strategies and communications. The Communication Officer is responsible for complying with applicable contract and sponsor requirements and following all IIE policies and procedures.

Essential Functions:

Media Relations and Communications: Engages with local/national media circles to promote program activities through various communications means. Works directly with USAID’s Department of Communication to promote USAID’s assistance related to DISP. Develop and maintain key relationships with other implementing partners. Designs and manages promotions and advertisement on behalf of the project within approved budget.
Website and content Management: Writes and publishes website, blog and email newsletters and campus visit reports, Manages and regularly updates website, Facebook, Twitter (social media platforms in general. Works closely with DISP team to create and implement strategies in developing online content. Develops success stories and capture progress to contribute to the Performance Management Plan (PMP), progress reports and manages the project’s branding plan.
Events Management: Plans and implements large-scale media events to highlight program successes, coordinating with a wide array of stakeholders. Plans and leads communication activities under supervision that is primarily strategic in nature. In collaboration with M&E specialist, measure and report on the effectiveness of communications activities.
Travel: As required will travel to project locations, which may include Myanmar, Thailand, Cambodia, Philippines, Indonesia, and Sri Lanka.
Administrative: Liaises with external printing company for all print projects to communicate content, layout, format, design. Ensures print projects stay within designated budget and verify branding on training program material.

Education and Work Experience:

 Requires a bachelor’s degree and at least five (5) years of related experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:


Strong organizational skills.
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, specifically strong writing skills, presentation skills and proven editing skills.
Ability to work well with multiple teams on a daily basis.
Ability to work under pressure and on several projects simultaneously and to set priorities to assure timely completion of tasks.
Knowledge of Microsoft Office, specifically Access, PowerPoint & Publisher.
Knowledge of and familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite.
Knowledge of social media marketing and Google Analytics.
Ability to edit copy/photos/videos.
Initiative to develop new projects.
Ability to create and implement strategies to develop online content.
Ability to write and edit clear, engaging, and grammatically correct content.
Ability to convey information in a clear, concise way, synthesizing information and presenting it to others.
Creative thinking and ability to work independently with minimum supervision.
Proficiency in written and oral English; Bilingual in Burmese and/or Thai is a plus.
Demonstrated skill developing relationships and pitching news stories to media.
Must be able to travel independently and support event setup.
Work Conditions & Physical Demands:
Essential functions are performed in a general office setting with low noise. Job demands may require long periods of sitting; telephone work and/or computer work, as well as interactions with other team members and external stakeholders. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. IIE is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.undefined
