IT Security Service OwnerTHAI UNION GROUP PCL.Job Highlights
Certifications such as CISSP, CISM or GIAC
Develop security service designs,security monitor
Analyze security metrics and reports to identifyJob Purpose:

Responsible for owning and managing the end-to-end delivery and performance of Security Services within the organization, in particular the SOC (Security Operations Center). You will collaborate with stakeholders, teams, and vendors to ensure the service meets business requirements, achieves service level targets, and delivers value to customers. You will oversee the security incident response, monitoring, and threat intelligence activities to ensure the security posture of the organization. This role requires a deep understanding of security operations, incident response, and the ability to apply industry best practices to protect critical assets in addition to a strong understanding of the Service Integration and Management (SIAM) framework and the ability to apply it effectively in a complex IT environment.

Job Responsibility:

Security Service Tactics and Design:
Define the tactical direction and vision for Security Services, in particular the Security Operations Center, aligned with business objectives and regulatory requirements.
Develop security service designs, including incident response plans, security monitoring procedures, threat intelligence capabilities, service level agreements (SLAs), service catalogs, and service improvement plans.
Identify security service dependencies, risks, and opportunities, and proactively manage them.
Security Service Transition:
Coordinate and oversee the transition of new or changed security services, tools, or processes into the operational environment.
Ensure appropriate testing, training, and documentation are in place to support effective security operations.
Collaborate with stakeholders to manage the communication and implementation of security service changes.
Security Service Operations:
Oversee the Security Operations Center Service, including security incident response, security monitoring, and threat intelligence activities.
Monitor and manage the performance, availability, and capacity of security systems, tools, and processes.
Analyze security metrics and reports to identify potential threats, vulnerabilities, and areas for improvement.
Coordinate incident, problem, and change management processes related to security incidents and operational activities.
Engage with internal and external teams to ensure timely response, investigation, and resolution of security incidents.
Security Service Improvement:
Continuously review and improve the effectiveness and efficiency of security operations based on industry best practices and emerging threats.
Lead security service improvement initiatives, identify opportunities for automation and optimization, and drive their implementation.
Conduct regular security service reviews with stakeholders to ensure alignment with security objectives and compliance requirements.
5. Relationship and Vendor Management:
Build and maintain strong relationships with internal stakeholders, such as IT teams, legal, and compliance, to ensure effective collaboration and coordination.
Engage with security vendors and service providers, manage contracts, and ensure service level agreements are met.
Collaborate with procurement and contract management teams to evaluate and select security services.

Job requirements:

University degree/College diploma in the field of computer science and/or information security or a related field (or equivalent experience)
Extensive experience in service management, service delivery, or related roles
In-depth knowledge of security operations, including threat intelligence, security monitoring, and incident response processes
Strong understanding of ITIL best practices and experience implementing IT service management processes
In-depth knowledge of the Service Integration and Management (SIAM) framework
Strong understanding of security frameworks, such as NIST Cybersecurity Framework, and industry best practices
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders.
Analytical mindset with the ability to analyze security data and metrics to drive continuous improvement.
Strong leadership skills and the ability to influence and inspire cross-functional security teams.
Project management experience, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple initiatives concurrently.
Vendor management experience, including contract negotiation and performance management in the security domain.
Professional certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or GIAC certifications are preferred.undefined

Marketing Manager (XCL ASB or D-Prep)XCL American School of Bangkok & D-PrepJob Highlights
Proven experience in marketing and communication
Excellent written and verbal communication
Strong knowledge of branding principlesPosition Objectives 

The Marketing & Communication Manager at ASB or DPREP is a key player responsible for shaping the school's image and promoting its mission in the K-12 education sector. This role entails planning and executing marketing initiatives, brand development, event management, partnership programs, collateral creation, PR activities, and external communication strategies that drive enrollment growth and brand awareness. The Marketing & Communication Manager will work closely with the admissions team, and other stakeholders to ensure the school's goals are met.

Responsibilities

Marketing Initiatives: 

Develop and execute offline marketing strategies that promote XCL, ASB & DPREP to  prospective students, parents, and stakeholders. 
Conduct market research to identify opportunities and threats, adapting strategies  accordingly. 
Monitor marketing performance metrics and adjust campaigns as needed. 

Branding & Brand Awareness: 

Define and implement branding guidelines that maintain a consistent and compelling  school identity. 
Enhance brand awareness through various offline channels, ensuring that the school's  values and unique selling points are effectively communicated. 

Event Management: 

Work closely with Admissions to plan and organize events (open houses, fairs,  exhibitions, etc.) to showcase the school's programs and facilities. 
Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to ensure successful event  execution. 

Partnership Programs: 

Identify and establish strategic partnerships with local businesses, organizations, and  educational institutions to expand the school's reach and reputation. 
Manage and nurture existing partnerships to maximize their potential. 
Embassies, Corporate Partners, and Parents Communities for “Referrals”  

Collaterals & Marketing Materials:


Create and oversee the production of marketing materials, brochures, banners,  advertisements, and other promotional materials. 
Ensure all materials are consistent with branding guidelines and effectively convey the  school's message.

Public Relations (PR) Activities: 

Develop and maintain relationships with local media, bloggers, and influencers.
Create and distribute press releases, organize media events, and manage school related news and stories. 

Enrollment Impact: 

Collaborate with the admissions team to ensure marketing and communication  strategies effectively attract and convert prospective students into enrollments.
Monitor and analyze enrollment trends and adapt strategies as needed. 

Requirements 

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field 
Proven experience in marketing and communication roles, with a minimum of 3 years in a  managerial position, preferably in the education sector. 
Strong knowledge of branding principles and experience in successfully managing brand  identity. 
Exceptional event management and partnership development skills. 
Proficiency in creating marketing collaterals and materials. 
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, in both Thai and English
Proficiency in principle of digital marketing, social media management, and public relations.
Ability to think creatively, strategically, and analytically. 
Strong project management and leadership abilities. 
Passion for education and a deep understanding of the K-12 education sector is a plus.
Able to work under pressure undefined

IT Support SpecialistPKF Holdings (Thailand) LimitedJob Highlights
IT Support in all forms
Troubleshoot and resolve technical problems
Provide training and assistance to usersThe IT Support Specialist is going to be responsible for providing technical support to users of the company's IT systems and infrastructure. This includes resolving hardware and software problems, providing training and assistance to users, and ensuring the smooth operation of the company's IT systems.

Responsibilities

· Provide technical support to users of the company's IT systems and infrastructure, including resolving hardware and software problems, providing training and assistance, and ensuring the smooth operation of the company's IT systems.

· Work with users to identify and resolve technical issues, including troubleshooting, diagnosing, and repairing hardware and software problems.

· Provide training and assistance to users on the use of the company's IT systems and software.

· Document technical issues and solutions for future reference.

· Work with other IT professionals to maintain and improve the company's IT infrastructure.

· Troubleshoot and resolve technical problems with hardware, software, and networks.

· Provide technical support to users via phone, email, and chat.

· Provide training and assistance to users on how to use the company's IT systems.

· Document technical problems and solutions.

Experienced in multiple issue tracking tools
Strong analytical and Problem-Solving skills.

Having programming background and preliminary middleware knowledge

Ability to Troubleshoot and Diagnose problems
Ability to Communicate Effectively to help users fix their issues and feel satisfied with the experience, Writing and Editing Skills to create incident reports

Being flexible and open to regular changes
Desire to continue learning and improving
Why work with us
We are a team of experts in a talented community, a collaborative atmosphere where creativity is encouraged. People First, by putting people at the heart of our priorities, we foster a work environment where you can excel and grow personally and professionally. Bluebik is strived for growth and expansion, and you can be part of our success story. We combine strategy, digital delivery excellence and deep technology advisory to help our clients transform their business. At Bluebik, your career advancement starts with actions. You can manage your own career and will advance based on performance. We collaborate to create unique and outstanding experiences with our talents to empower learning and growth opportunities. Whatever your ambitions, Bluebik offers you with a highly inclusive community of talents from both tech and business worlds to realize your full potential.

What we offer
We offer impactful and challenging work with mentorship and support from direct managers and subject matter experts. You will have autonomy to manage your career path with endless opportunities for professional growth. Our comprehensive benefit package covers medical insurance, life, accident and disability insurance, wellness allowance, vaccination allowance, providence fund, flexible working arrangement, and Professional certification. Bluebik provides opportunities to become the best version of yourself!

Equal opportunity
Bluebik is an equal opportunity employer. We owe our success to the talents of our diverse team and the varying perspectives they add to our thriving community.

Recruitment agencies
Bluebik does not accept unsolicited resumes sent by recruiting agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our job postings, Bluebik employees or other parts of the business. Bluebik will not be liable to pay any fees to agencies for candidates hired as a result of unrequested resumes.undefined

Tech Claims Manager, ThailandStarr International Insurance (Thailand) Public Company LimitedJob Highlights
Degree level or equivalent, Fluent in English
Min. 12 years experience in Property Claims
Min. 5 years handling High End Engineering ClaimsStarr Insurance Companies is a leading insurance and investment organization, providing commercial property and casualty insurance, including travel and accident coverage, to almost every imaginable business and industry in virtually every part of the world.

Cornelius Vander Starr established his first insurance company in Shanghai, China in 1919. Today, we are one of the world’s fastest growing insurance organizations, capable of writing in 128 countries on 6 continents.

GENERAL SUMMARY

The position will be reporting to the Asia Pacific Claims Director, overall responsibility for all property & engineering claims in Thailand, including the development of the claims team and handling of larger losses in Thailand. Other responsibilities as required by Thailand CEO or Claims Director.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

In addition to day to day claims handling, the successful candidate will also be required to liaise with underwriters in regard to:-

Wording interpretation
Identifying unusual characteristics of a particular loss and indications of moral hazard
Identifying common causes of frequent losses
Potential marketing opportunities and assistance in new business development
Provide presentations to customers as appropriate

The role brings with it a need to maintain awareness of market and corporate issues through attendance at market meetings, reading relevant publications and networking.

In addition, there will be a need to develop and train the Tech claims team in line with the needs of the business.

QUALIFICATIONS

Job Specifications:

Thai National. Fluent in English (written and spoken) essential.

Education:

Degree level or equivalent

Experience:

At least 12 years experience in the property claims field, including at least 5 years handling high end engineering claims in the Thai market.

NOTE: This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. Employee may perform other related duties as negotiated to meet the ongoing needs of the organization

Interested parties please apply with full resume (with availability, current/last & expected salary).

Starr is an equal opportunity employer, which means we'll consider all suitably qualified applicants regardless of gender identity or expression, ethnic origin, nationality, religion or beliefs, age, sexual orientation, disability status or any other protected characteristic. We recruit and develop our people based on merit and we're committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We offer first class training and development opportunities to all employees. Our aim is to grow our own talent and bring out the best in people.undefined

Website Management Executive for Wholesale Body Jewelry B2B Exporter in Bangkok/All nationalities with proven experience are welcome to applyAcha Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Website Management Executive of Multinational
All nationalities are welcome to apply
Work permit / Multiple nationalities in the officeWebsite Management Executive

We accept applications from all nationalities

Job Description

Working in tandem with the E-commerce Manager to evaluate, prioritize, develop, manage, implement and test various backend services/initiatives and new functionality implementations for E-commerce stores.
Develop and oversee the effective planning, QA, and execution of content across the websites to ensure efficiency, accuracy, and timeliness of all web content publishing.
Manage product catalog by updating pricing and item availability, uploading new products, and improving existing content for SEO-related purposes.
Manage the user experience of the website including site navigation, content development, checkout funnel, and implement additional functionality to match user needs.
Monitor, analyze, and issue reports for E-commerce marketplace retail pricing and provide go-forward recommendations.
Partner with data and analytics teams to better understand customer behavior and translate that into improved updated E-commerce strategies.
Communicate and partner effectively with all key stakeholders including production, sales, website development, and others to ensure seamless execution of the E-commerce workflow process.
Identify and implement needed process improvements across Acha required to support E-commerce growth.
Writing instructions for related departments.
Support the Digital Marketing strategy of the company.

Profile:

You take ownership of the performance of the E-commerce stores.
You apply critical thinking, rigorous analytics, and a hypothesis-driven approach to identify areas of opportunity to drive the growth of the business.
You are proactive and action-oriented to execute on all opportunities.
You thrive in a cross-functional and collaborative environment.
You leverage your expertise and competitive analysis to identify trends that you can take advantage of.
You will effectively communicate your ideas and insights to your supervisor.
Dynamic and adaptable – you don’t mind switching gears and focusing on a wide variety of tasks/assignments.

Qualifications:

Strong experience with E-commerce platforms based on Magento or extensive knowledge of E-Commerce technology.
Strong analytical skills, and strong experience interpreting test results & drawing conclusions.
Demonstrated strong business judgment and decision-making skills with the ability to identify, prioritize, and articulate the highest-impact initiatives.
Bachelor's Degree or higher in Business Administration, Computing Engineering, E-Commerce, or related field.
1-3 years of professional experience in E-commerce roles.
Good command of both written and spoken English.
Experience in project management would be a plus.
Experience with system architecture is a strong advantage.
Experience with agile and scrum development methodology is a plus.
Experience in cooperation with website developer teams.
Back-end engineer/website development experience is a plus.
Strong data and analytics experience.
High accuracy with keen attention to detail (detail-oriented personality).
Excellent MS Office (Word, Excel) and Google product (Sheets, Drive, Gmail) knowledge.
Growth mindset, eager to learn and improve.
Self-starter, coachable, organized, result-driven with good problem-solving skills.
Ability to read/write technical documentation or instructions in English.
Ability to work in a team as well as independently.

Benefits:

Working in an international atmosphere, with people from all over the world
Flexible personal leave days & working hours and the possibility of taking non-paid personal leaves
Work 5 days per week
Full-time and long-term contract
6 Days of Paid annual leave + Up to 4 Bonus Days per year
13 Thai national holidays per year (these days are interchangeable)
Up to 3 days of business paid leave
Half-day off on your birthday
3-day company trip each year
Multiple company parties each year
Paid sick leave
Condo/apartment rental prices in the area are reasonable

Open to candidates from different nationalities such as Spain, Deutschland, France, Italy, Portugal, Sweden, Denmark, Israel, Netherlands, Hungary, Greece, Norway, Romania, Austria, Poland, Czech Republic, Ireland, Finland, Switzerland, Belgium, Slovenia, Australia, USA, Canada, United Kingdom.


3rd Languages are welcomed such as Spanish, Deutsch, French, Italian, Portuguese, Swedish, Danish, Hebrew, Dutch, Hungarian, Greek, Czech, Norwegian, Romanian, Slovene, Slovak, Polish, Latvian, Lithuanian, Finnish, Estonian, Bulgarian, Bavarian & Croatian.

Different aspects of the job: Administration, Operations, Recruitment, Executive Search, Marketing, Product Management, F & B, Manufacturing, Product Development, Gold & Silver Jewellery Production Planning, Strategic Planning, Merchandising, Purchasing, Online E-Commerce, Sourcing, Business Analysis, Wholesale, Factory, Business Consultancy & Trading, Leader Training, Assembly, Team Building, HR, Procurement, Finance, Marketing, Sales, Inventory, Quality Control, Equipment Maintenance, Recruitment, B2B, International Trade, Distribution, Import / Export, Suppliers, Dealers.


Acha Company Limited

247, 249 Tanao Rd., Bavornives, Pranakorn, Bangkok 10200, Thailand 

Website: www.achadirect.com

About Acha Co., Ltd.:

Acha Co., Ltd. is a multinational company with a Western management team with more than 20 years as a wholesale exporter of body jewelry. Our customers are almost exclusively from countries like Spain, the USA, the UK, Deutschland, France, the Netherlands, Austria, Italy, and Australia, etc. You can find more information on our body piercing website: www.achadirect.com.

Our Bangkok office is located near Khao San and we currently employ nearly 100 staff. We are recruiting energetic and talented individuals who want to thrive in a team-oriented work environment. Our company is constantly growing and this year we have done so at a rate of 25%, despite all the economic difficulties caused by the pandemic. Working at Acha is a long-term winning project.undefined

The Purchasing Manager - Packaging is responsible for managing the procurement of raw materials for the organization. This includes overseeing the purchase and negotiating with vendors. Develop and implement strategies for purchasing raw materials in line with the company's goals and objectives
Research and identify potential suppliers of raw materials, and negotiate favorable terms and pricing with vendors
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand their raw materials needs and requirements, and develop specifications accordingly
Manage supplier relationships and performance, and resolve any issues that arise
Analyze purchasing data and trends, and use this information to make informed purchasing decisions and identify cost-saving opportunities
Develop and maintain reports on purchasing activity, supplier performance, and inventory levels, and present this information to senior management as needed

Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze data and make informed decisions
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with suppliers and internal stakeholders

Senior Petroleum Engineer / Petroleum Engineer/วิศวกรปิโตรเลี่ยมอาวุโสPan Orient Energy (Siam) Ltd.Job Highlights
Perform well/reservoir performance analysis
5-10 years of experience as Petroleum Engineer
Work at BKK officePosition Summary:

This position is reporting directly to General Manger, the Pan Orient Energy (Siam) Ltd with the main duty to Perform well/reservoir performance analysis to optimize the production and maximize hydrocarbon recovery at cost effective manner while maintaining a strong emphasis on reducing environmental impact.

This position needs to work with Geoscientist to increase the sub-surface understanding and reduce uncertainty in dealing with sub-surface work plan, identify the workover opportunity and lead the maturation process and perform Yearly Reserve Assessment exercise and update the reserve status accordingly.

Role and Responsibilities Details:

Maintained the production/well/zone and reservoir database according to the well intervention sequent with the production performance accordingly.
Co-ordinate with Well Engineers for all Workover Programs, Workover Reports & revised Well Schematics
Maintain the reserve database and keep track the reserve movement from PDN to PDP and update the PDP reserve estimates on yearly basis
Responsible to communicate with DMF and other Government bodies as required, this should be to assist in DMF information requests and company support issues
Review the MDT/RFT pressure for sand connectivity study to support the sub-surface well intervention plan
Actively review the well/reservoir performance for production optimization and organize the sub-surface review, collaborate and work together with Geoscientist in the team
Identify the surface and process system and address the de-bottle-necking elements to maximize the production
Perform PE duties including Well pressure surveys and fluid analysis and data plots, this should include Oil / Gas analysis Reports / third part liaison.
Field monitoring and advise production operation on the physical constraint applicable to the reservoir characteristic, give solution or other reservoir management to increase well potential and development
Perform hydrocarbon accountant, finalize production profile, incorporate identified opportunities to improve production potential or availability
Actively search for improvement, reservoir study and initiate new technology and incorporating it where applicable to improve or enhance crude oil recovery
Prepare the short-term and long-term production forecast to generate the long-term revenue forecast as part of Business Planning exercise
Coordinate the Work Program and Budget especially for Workover and well intervention program
Prepare the well conversion if applicable to support water flood/water disposal requirement
Monitor the water injection/disposal and provide a necessary well surveillance requirement
Perform PDP reserve assessment using Decline Curve Analysis (DCA) as part of year reserve assessment.
Advise Operations department on the physical constraints applicable to well / reservoir / field production (e.g. sand, water, gas production, scaling potential, corrosion potential, etc.
Qualification:

Bachelor's degree in Petroleum Engineering
5-10 years of experience as Petroleum Engineerundefined

เจ้าหน้าที่ สำนักงาน คปภ. เขตบางนา/OfficerOffice Of Insurance CommissionJob Highlights
งานรับและพิจารณาเรื่องร้องเรียนการประกันภัย
งานไกล่เกลี่ยข้อพิพาทและคุ้มครองสิทธิประโยชน์
สมัครผ่านwww.oic.or.thเมนูสมัครงาน>รับสมัครพนักงานหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ
ดำเนินการพิจารณาเรื่องร้องเรียนทั้งระบบทางด่วนประกันภัย (Complaint unit) และระบบไกล่เกลี่ยเพื่อยุติข้อพิพาทที่ร้องเรียนผ่านศูนย์บริการด้านการประกันภัย (ISC) ด้วยตัวเอง เว็บไซต์ อีเมล เว็บบอร์ด หนังสือร้องเรียนจากประชาชนที่ส่งมาโดยตรง หรือผ่านทางหน่วยงานอื่น และ เรื่องร้องเรียนที่ส่งมาจากสำนักงาน คปภ. ภูมิภาค ทั่วประเทศในกรณีที่ไม่สามารถยุติได้
รับและพิจารณาเรื่องร้องเรียน ไกล่เกลี่ยข้อพิพาทโดยพนักงานเจ้าหน้าที่ และพิจารณาให้ความเป็นธรรม เพื่อคุ้มครองสิทธิประโยชน์ของประชาชนด้านการประกันภัย
ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องทั้งภายในและภายนอกองค์กร เพื่อให้ได้ข้อเท็จจริงมาประกอบการพิจารณาเรื่องร้องเรียน เช่น พนักงานสอบสวนโรงพยาบาล กรมการขนส่งทางบก กรมการปกครอง กรมที่ดิน กรมบังคับคดี แพทยสภา เป็นต้น
อธิบายให้ความรู้การคุ้มครองสิทธิประโยชน์ด้านการประกันภัย เพื่อให้ผู้เอาประกันภัย และประชาชนทราบถึงสิทธิประโยชน์ที่จะได้รับจากการทำประกันภัยต่างๆ อย่างครบถ้วนถูกต้อง
ให้คำปรึกษาปัญหาข้อพิพาท และแนวทางไกล่เกลี่ยข้อพิพาทด้านการประกันภัยแก่ หน่วยงานภาครัฐ ภาคเอกชน และประชาชนทั่วไป เพื่อเป็นการให้ความรู้เกี่ยวกับคุ้มครองสิทธิประโยชน์ด้านการประกันภัยแก่ประชาชน
สรุปข้อเท็จจริง ข้อกฎหมาย และเสนอความเห็นเพื่อทำความเห็น แจ้งผลการพิจารณาผู้ร้องเรียน บริษัทประกันภัย และหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง
จัดทำโครงการเผยแพร่ความรู้ด้านการคุ้มครองสิทธิประโยชน์ที่จะได้รับจากการทำประกันภัยประเภทต่างๆอย่างครบถ้วน ถูกต้อง
ศึกษา วิเคราะห์ รวบรวมข้อมูล สภาพปัญหา เกี่ยวกับการประกันชีวิต ประกันภัยรถยนต์ทั้งการประกันภาคบังคับ และภารสมัครใจ และประกันภัยทุกประเภท
บริหารจัดการ การเงิน/บัญชี และพัสดุ ของสำนักงานฯ

We are seeking a dynamic and result-oriented CX Growth Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be reporting into Head of Growth and Consulting under Customer Experience Management (CXM) business within dentsu Thailand, working closely with CEO of CXM and broader dentsu’s leadership teams across media and creative service lines, regional practices, and product alliances to mutually build growth for CXM business in Thailand.

The CX Growth Manager will be responsible for developing and executing sales strategy, driving sales, lead generation, business development, pursuing deals, and capturing new opportunities in the enterprise platforms (CX / Martech) sales space that help our clients to succeed in their business growth by utilizing dentsu’s CXM integrated offerings for Thailand territory.

A major lever for growth is our ability to create value for clients by packaging and selling multiple capabilities from across the CXM practice areas. The CX Growth Manager needs to be able to articulate a coherent value proposition for clients across CXM offerings to include business strategy, commerce, customer experience, digital and advanced analytics, data strategy and enterprise technology solutions.

Conduct market research to understand industry trends and competitor offerings.
Develop and maintain a robust pipeline of qualified leads.

โทรศัพท์เพื่อพูดคุยกับลูกค้าถึงปัญหาที่เผชิญอยู่ในการขาย e-commerce
สื่อสารให้ได้อย่างชัดเจนว่าซอฟต์แวร์ของเราทำอะไร และมีขอดีต่อบริษัทลูกค้าอย่างไรบ้าง

คุณสมบัติที่คุณต้องการ:

ไม่กลัวที่จะโทรหาลูกค้าจำนวนมากและสามารถรับมือกับการถูกปฏิเสธได้

ชอบการทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นและมีทัศนคติที่ดีในการทำงาน
ทำไมคุณจึงควรทำงานกับเรา:

ทำงานในบริษัทเทคโนโลยีชั้นสูงที่พัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์

รายละเอียดงาน

ดูแลฝ่ายการตลาด
แนวทางเชิงกลยุทธ์ในแผนการตลาด และการบริหารจัดการเพื่อให้สอดคล้องกับนโยบายขององค์กร และนำไปสู่ทิศทางของเป้าหมายทางธุรกิจ
วางแผนการตลาดและบริหารการตลาดทั้งระบบทุกช่องทางของกลุ่มสินค้า
จัดทำแผนงาน ช่องทางการส่งเสริมการขาย แผนประชาสัมพันธ์พร้อมติดตามประเมินผล
ทำงานร่วมกับฝ่ายขายและฝ่ายปฏิบัติการเพื่อพัฒนากลยุทธ์การกำหนดราคาเพื่อเพิ่มผลกำไรและส่วนแบ่งตลาดสูงสุดในขณะเดียวกันก็รักษาสมดุลความพึงพอใจของลูกค้า
ดำเนินการวิเคราะห์สภาพแวดล้อมการแข่งขันและแนวโน้มของผู้บริโภคอย่างต่อเนื่อง
พัฒนาและส่งมอบกลยุทธ์การตลาดและการสื่อสารสำหรับองค์กร
จัดการการแสดงตนบนโซเชียลมีเดียและโปรแกรมโดยตรงเพื่อปรับปรุงชื่อเสียงและการยอมรับของโซเชียลมีเดีย
พัฒนางบประมาณการตลาดระยะสั้นและระยะยาวเพื่อให้บรรลุตัวชี้วัด ตรวจสอบความคืบหน้าและเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพการ ใช้ข้อมูลพฤติกรรมของผู้บริโภค

ควบคุมการวางแผนการผลิตกระแสไฟฟ้าและไอน้ำให้ระบบมีความพร้อมและมั่นคง  ตรวจสอบและควบคุมการเดินเครื่องและบำรุงรักษาโรงไฟฟ้าให้เป็นไปตามแผนงาน ตามสัญญา ตามกฏหมายและตามมาตรฐานทางวิศวกรรม ควบคุมให้มีการพัฒนาปรับปรุงสมรรถนะของเครื่องจักรอุปกรณ์ที่ใช้ในการผลิตให้มีประสิทธิภาพอยู่เสมอการบริหารจัดการสัญญาหลักต่างๆ การต่ออายุใบอนุญาต การขออนุญาต ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับกระบวนการผลิต ให้ถูกต้องและครบถ้วนเป็นไปตามข้อตกลงและเงื่อนไขต่างๆ      ที่ระบุในสัญญา รวบรวมข้อมูล1ผลการดำเนินงานเพื่อนำเสนอระหว่างการประชุมกับคณะกรรมการบริษัท รวมถึงสร้างความสัมพันธ์ และสร้างความพึงพอใจลูกค้าให้มีความพึงพอใจต่อผลิตภัณฑ์และบริการของบริษัทฯ



รายละเอียดงาน

ควบคุมการวางแผนการผลิตให้ระบบมีความพร้อมและมั่นคง
ตรวจสอบและควบคุมการเดินเครื่องและบำรุงรักษาโรงไฟฟ้าให้เป็นไปตามแผนงาน ตามสัญญา ตามกฎหมายและตามมาตรฐานทางวิศวกรรม
ดำเนินการให้มีการพัฒนาปรับปรุงสมรรถนะของเครื่องจักร อุปกรณ์ที่ใช้ในการผลิต เพื่อให้มีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด
กำกับดูแล ตรวจสอบและควบคุมการบริหารจัดการสัญญาหลักต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการผลิต การซื้อขายไฟฟ้า การซื้อขายก๊าซธรรมชาติ การเดินเครื่องและบำรุงรักษา กับคู่สัญญาต่างๆให้เป็นไปตามเงื่อนไขต่างๆ ของสัญญา
ประสานงานติดต่อหน่วยงานต่างๆที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการเดินเครื่องและบำรุงรักษาโรงไฟฟ้า เพื่อให้การดำเนินธุรกิจเป็นไปโดยราบรื่น
แสวงหาลูกค้าอุตสาหกรรมรายใหม่ๆและดูแลรักษาคุณภาพต่อลูกค้ารายปัจจุบันให้มีความพึงพอใจต่อผลิตภัณฑ์และบริการของบริษัทฯ
อำนวยการด้านการอนุรักษ์พลังงานตามกฎหมาย และกฎหมายด้านความปลอดภัยและสิ่งแวดล้อม
ดำเนินการในเรื่องการนำส่งเงินเข้ากองทุนพัฒนาไฟฟ้า ตรวจสอบค่าซื้อไฟฟ้าสำรอง ค่าสาธารณูปโภคต่างๆ ภายในนิคมอุตสาหกรรมราชบุรี
รวบรวมข้อมูลการใช้ทรัพยากรในการผลิตไฟฟ้าเพื่อวิเคราะห์ประมวลผล รายงานสภาพการผลิตและประสิทธิภาพในการผลิตไฟฟ้าระหว่างการประชุมกับคณะกรรมการบริษัท
จัดทำและควบคุมงบประมาณประจำปีด้านรายได้ค่าขายไฟฟ้าและไอน้ำ และรายจ่ายหลักที่สำคัญ
คุณสมบัติ
วุฒิปริญญาตรีหรือสูงกว่า สาขาวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ด้าน ไฟฟ้า เครื่องกล  หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง
ภาวะความเป็นผู้นำ มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี มีทักษะการสื่อสารที่ดี และสร้างแรงจูงใจให้กับผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา ให้ปฏิบัติงานบรรลุตามวัตถุประสงค์ที่กำหนดได้
ประสบการณ์ทำงาน


ประสบการณ์ทำงาน 10 ปีขึ้นไป ด้านการเดินเครื่อง และบำรุงรักษาโรงไฟฟ้า  มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการวิเคราะห์และวางแผนการผลิตและประสิทธิภาพในการผลิตไฟฟ้า
ประสบการณ์ในการบริหารจัดการสัญญาซื้อขายไฟฟ้า จากโรงไฟฟ้าเอกชน IPP SPP หรือโรงไฟฟ้าของรัฐ รวมถึงการบริหารโครงการและผู้รับเหมาช่วงระยะยาวundefined

QA/QC Manager (Base in Cambodia)Hi-Tech Apparel Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Quality control
Garment manufacture
Oversea opportunityResponsibilities

Establish policies, plans, and objectives for quality control, materials, and production processes.
Conduct daily and weekly inspections and quality assurance to ensure timely delivery of products according to schedule.
Inspect and perform Manufacturing Validation of measuring tools and production support systems in accordance with customer requirements and company policies.
Responsible for quality control and assurance systems, ensuring that quality and production processes comply with standards and customer requirements.
Control and conduct self-inspection, quality risk management, and change control.
Analyze and prepare Product Quality Review reports, presenting issues and proposed solutions to management.
Coordinate with production, production planning, inventory, and related departments to ensure effective communication and coordination of inspection and quality assurance processes.
Coordinate with customers to communicate relevant information and prepare work instructions in accordance with requirements.
Review and prepare various quality-related documents, controlling document operations in accordance with standards.
Control and train subordinate staff under direct supervision in quality inspection according to defined standards.
Perform other duties as assigned by the immediate supervisor as necessary for the position.

Specification

Holds a degree in Industrial Textile Engineering or a related field.
Possesses 5 years or more of direct work experience in a factory environment.
Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build and maintain effective relationships with colleagues and stakeholders.
Demonstrated leadership qualities, including the ability to inspire and motivate others.
Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to address and resolve issues in a proactive and timely manner.
Ability to plan and execute tasks effectively, including project management skills.
Team player with the ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
Effective communication skills, both verbal and written, in Thai and English.
Strong organizational skills with attention to detail and ability to prioritize tasks.
Proficient in email communication and internet usage.
Advanced skills in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for document creation, data analysis, and presentations.undefined

Senior Associate / Assistant Vice President in Credit AdvisoryKiatnakin Phatra Securities Public Company LimitedJob Highlights
Bachelor or above in Finance, Accounting, Economic
3-7 years of work experience as a credit analyst
Good command in EnglishJob summary: 

Credit Advisory was established under Investment Banking & Capital Markets Group, with a role to provide credit rating’s related opinions, recommendations, and solutions within KKP Financial Group, as well as to our clients. Our unique credit advisory service advises our clients on their credit profile from preliminary credit rating assessment, advising on credit rating process and preparation, and advising on potential impact of corporate actions on credit rating, such as M&As, restructuring, and fundraising activities. For debenture issuance in primary markets, we work closely with Debt Capital Market team on product screening process, performing due diligence, and providing credit assessment reports.



Role and Responsibilities : 

Perform credit analysis to provide credit recommendations for debenture issuers, such as preparing financial modeling of corporate clients, providing credit opinions, writing credit reports, and presenting to relevant parties.
Provide value-added credit rating related services as part of new client acquisition and existing client’s relationship, with exposure to several industries.
Work in a team to assist senior analysts and guide junior analysis on providing credit recommendations and presentation.
The successful candidate should not only be able to formulate a timely and logical credit story but also able to communicate effectively with internal and external clients, such as delivering messages that cover key issues and credit concern with cautious on appropriateness of our credit view, able to give a quick and concise credit opinion within a short timeline, be able to explain our credit analysis in a simple and understanding message, adaptable to different related parties’ credit related requirements.



Qualifications :  

Bachelor’s degree or above with outstanding academic record in Finance, Accounting, Economic, or the related fields (A master’s degree is preferable.)
Minimum 3-7 years of work experience as a credit analyst in financial institutions or credit rating agencies
Strong analytical skill with a knowledge of credit rating and financial modeling
Good command in English
Self-motivated, fast learning, and attentive to detail 
Able to work in a small team and work well under pressure undefined

Business Development Executive / Manager/Business Development Executive / ManagerWisible Company LimitedJob Highlights
Solution Design
Technical background
Problem solvingAbout Wisible

We are a startup building a business clarity platform for the enterprise space. Our SaaS product, Wisible, helps businesses gain visibility throughout the prospect-to-payment journey, increase win rates, shorten sales cycles, and improve forecast accuracy.

Behind the product is a team of product builders, technology lovers, problem solvers, coffee drinkers, and collaborators, and we're looking for people to join us on our exciting journey ahead.

Website: www.wisible.com
Location: 900m from Rama 9 MRT station
Map: https://g.page/Wisible?share

Job Description

We are looking for a skilled Solution Architect to join our team at a Business Clarity Platform startup. As a Solution Architect, your responsibilities will include designing and selling a complex software solutions for our clients.

Responsibilities
Identify the customer's pain points, translate them into product requirements, and come up with a solution to solve these pain points using our platform.
Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets.
Generate, explore, and develop new business sales.
Meet with clients and conduct product demonstrations.
Write comprehensive proposals for customization projects.
Collaborate with software engineers, product managers, and project managers to discuss customer requirements, ensure that solutions are technically feasible, solve customer problems, and deliver return on investment (ROI).
Follow up with calls, create proposals, quotations, and negotiate to close deals.
Assist with the development and improvement of the product by gathering feedback to identify recurring issues and addressing them with the product manager.
Requirements
You have a technical background, whether you graduated or worked in a technical position before, but now you want to explore the business side of things.
Experience in solution selling is a big plus, but not required.
Education in IT, Computer Science, Engineering, Business Administration, or a related field.
Good command of English
Willing to switch roles according to the business need
Benefits:
There is no dress code, so you can wear whatever makes you feel comfortable.
Health insurance
Enjoy life with the great team
10 vacation days
Free Snackundefined

Manager Area Manufacturing (Fabrication & Paint)Harley-Davidson (Thailand) LimitedJob Highlights
Strong in Management and Leadership Skill
Strong knowledge in Fabrication and Paint Process
Good in English CommunicationJob Summary  

Directs the overall manufacturing production throughput and any related initiatives set by the Company for a manufacturing in Fabrication & Painting areas. Optimizes the efficiency of the manufacturing operations in an area of manufacturing. Understands key business drivers and successfully manages and influences positive return on investments using lean manufacturing techniques.

The candidate must be able to interface and collaborate with a variety of other manufacturing managers, Materials planners, Lead schedulers, and various other leadership of Fabrication & painted components to the assembly lines and drive day to day improvements for current production.   They will lead LEAN initiatives to drive manufacturing efficiency improvements for safety, quality, delivery, and cost. 

 Job Responsibilities:

 Meet or exceed safety, quality, cost, delivery, people/engagement, and sustainability metrics (SQDCPS targets) for a process area.
 Walk the floor providing leadership, layered process audits and coaching (floor time of 40% or greater).
 Ensure the process is functioning properly through layered audits and discipline to process.
 Lead & Coaching the team of first line supervisors in the management of the production schedule and managing the engineering staff supporting the process area.
Rotation by appointment from one process area to another is a requirement of this position to ensure optimal business flexibility while providing expertise development.
 Respond to SD&I  (Sales ,Delivery & Inventory) ,prepare and plan to achieve KPI and work units plan .
Make sure Shop floor control and system have been implemented through the entire Process.
Improve Overall Equipment Efficiency, Drive to Lean Organizations
Analyze SD & I versus capacity, space, WIP Optimize manufacturing to System & Resource.
Implements JIT and Lean Manufacturing principles (5s, Six Sigma, CI system, etc.)
Lead & Control Robust Method for Kanban, Shopfloor control, Lead time reduction ,Scrap Reduction.
Study and analyze all resources required for new products and prepare for product readiness.
Development and implementation of systems and processes to ensure continuous improvement, world-class-level quality, and a high-performance work environment.
Interface with other Lead and manager and control Manufacturing Flow and Shop Floor Control and to support existing product and process.

 Education Requirements

 Bachelor’s degree or higher in Production, Industrial, Mechanical, Electrical engineering, or related Manufacturing fields.

Experience Requirements

Required

Typically requires a minimum of 10 years on high volume systems in automotive, motorcycle, or parts manufacturing.

As Head of Accounting, you will provide advisory and direction to the accounting team under B.Grimm Joint Venture Holding Ltd. Data Analyst ManagerCompany ConfidentialJob Highlights
Data Analyst Manager
Data Analytics
Native Thai speakerRole & Responsibilities:

As a Data Analyst Managerม you will play a pivotal role in our organization, contributing to the strategic use of data for marketing purposes. Your responsibilities include:



Data Gathering and Aggregation: Collect and aggregate data from various digital platforms.
Modeling and Segmenting: Perform data modeling and segmentation for effective marketing strategies.
Data Architecture Design: Build and design a robust data architecture for seamless data integration.
Translation of Numerical Findings: Translate complex numerical findings into clear and comprehensible written expressions, providing valuable decision support services and actionable insights.
Digital Analytics: Leverage digital analytics to enhance reach, engagement, conversion, and other key digital metrics.
Online Retailer Conversion Data: Access and integrate data from online retailers, focusing on conversion metrics.
Process Improvement: Identify and implement opportunities to enhance data gathering and report generating processes.
Reporting: Prepare detailed weekly and monthly reports in written formats covering social listening, digital campaigns, and performance analysis relative to set KPIs.
Client Reports: Ensure that reports presented to clients align with the specified reporting frequency.
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to derive actionable recommendations.
Ad-Hoc Duties: Undertake any other ad-hoc duties as assigned.
Stay Ahead: Stay current with the latest analytic tools, trends, and developments in the field.

Requirements:

To excel in this role, you should possess the following qualifications and skills:

Educational Background:

Hold a Degree in Marketing, Communication, New Media, Statistics, Mathematics, or related fields.

Experience:

Minimum 7+ years of experience in market research, business analytics, or relevant fields.

Analytical Skills:

Comfortable with data crunching, meticulous attention to detail, and effective multitasking.

Technical Proficiency:

Hands-on experience with analytics tools, including data extraction and report generation.

Marketing Automation:

Knowledge of marketing automation tools such as Power BI; familiarity with Adobe Analytics is advantageous.

Analytical Thinking:

Demonstrated ability to analyze marketing problems, track brand performance, and evaluate social content effectiveness.

Language Skills:

Fluent and articulate in English, both oral and written.

Programming Knowledge:

Familiarity with programming languages like SQL, Oracle, and Python is a plus.
This role provides a unique opportunity to contribute to our organization's success by harnessing the power of data for informed decision-making. We look forward to welcoming a dynamic and experienced professional to our team.

If you meet these requirements and are excited about this opportunity, we encourage you to submit your application.undefined

Marketing Manager/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายการตลาดPinthong Industrial Park Public Company LimitedJob Highlights

มีประสบการณ์การตลาด 5-7 ปีขึ้นไป
มีทักษะการใช้ภาษาอังกฤษที่ดีวางแผนกลยุทธ์ด้านการตลาดให้ตรงกับกลุ่มเป้าหมายและสอดคล้องกับงบประมาณเพื่อให้บรรลุเป้าหมายยอดขาย/กำไรของบริษัทฯ/การสื่อสารต่อนักลงทุนหรือการสื่อสารอื่น

วางแผนการสื่อสารการตลาดทุกช่องทางทั้งแบบ Above the line และ Below the line เพื่อสร้างการรับรู้ให้มากขึ้น รักษาภาพลักษณ์ของแบรนด์ / องค์กร และขยายฐานลูกค้า ทั้งในประเทศ และต่างประเทศ
วางแผน ควบคุม วิเคราะห์ สรุปผล การเผยแพร่สื่อประชาสัมพันธ์ต่าง ๆ ทุกช่องทาง Online-Offline รวมถึงกิจกรรมส่งเสริมการขายต่างๆทั้งในประเทศ และ ต่างประเทศ
ดำเนินการและควบคุมการผลิตเนื้อหา ,สื่อ , รูปภาพ  เพื่อเผยแพร่ ผ่านช่องทางที่เกี่ยวข้อง อาทิ Websiteของบริษัท หรือ External Website ต่าง ๆ ทั้งในประเทศ และ ต่างประเทศ โดยให้เป็นไปตาม CI (Corporate Identity) รวมถึงการผลิตสื่อที่ต้องการสื่อสารต่อนักลงทุนหรือหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง
ควบคุมงบประมาณทางการตลาดและสื่อสารองค์กร ได้รับมอบหมาย รวมถึงการทำ Profit & Loss ทุกช่องทาง Online – Offline 
สำรวจตลาด คู่แข่ง โดยลงการภาคสนาม และ ข่าวสารทางธุรกิจ เพื่อวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลทางการตลาด และเพิ่มโอกาสทางการขาย หรือ สร้างช่องทางการทำตลาดที่หลากหลาย และจัดทำรายงานเสนอผู้บริหาร
ติดตามและประสานงานร่วมกับโครงการภาครัฐ เพื่อสร้างความได้เปรียบทางธุรกิจ 
ตรวจสอบและจัดทำงานสื่อสารองค์กรทั้งภายในและภายนอกองค์กร ทั้งที่เป็น Media และ ป้ายติดตั้ง รวมถึงการทำ Presentation ในนามของบริษัท
รับผิดชอบงานอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย



                 คุณสมบัติเฉพาะตำแหน่ง


จบปริญญาตรีหรือปริญญาโทสาขาการตลาดหรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง 
ประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 5-7 ปีในด้านการตลาดหรือการตลาดภาคสนามที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการเปิดรับสื่อออนไลน์และออฟไลน์ 
มีทักษะการสื่อสารและการนำเสนอที่ดีเยี่ยม

Senior Sales Executive/เจ้าหน้าที่บริหารงานขายอาวุโสTurnkey Communication Services Public Company LimitedJob Highlights
เข้าใจกระบวนการศึกษา, แฟลตฟอร์มการเรียนการสอน
แบบประเมินออนไลน์, แบบทดสอบออนไลน์
สื่อสารภาษาจีนได้พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษบริษัท เอทีเอ เทสติ้ง (ประเทศไทย) จำกัด เป็นในเครือ บริษัท เทิร์นคีย์ คอมมูนิเคชั่น เซอร์วิส จำกัด มหาชน

ให้บริการทางด้านเทคโนโลยีทางการศึกษา แพลตฟอร์มการเรียนการสอน บริการทดสอบ (E-testing) และแบบประเมินทางอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ ATA ได้ให้บริการเทคโนโลยีการทดสอบระดับมืออาชีพ บริการจัดส่งการทดสอบ เนื้อหาการทดสอบ และบริการส่งเสริมการตลาดสำหรับ ลูกค้ามากมาย เช่น หน่วยงานราชการ สมาคมอุตสาหกรรม สถาบันการศึกษา และองค์กรต่าง ๆ

เรากำลังมองหาเจ้าหน้าที่บริหารงานขายที่มีความมุ่งมั่นและตั้งใจมาเข้าร่วมทีม ผู้สมัครจะต้องมีประสบการณ์ที่เชี่ยวชาญด้านการขายและการบริการลูกค้า มีประสบการณ์ในแวดวงการศึกษา หรือประเมินคุณวุฒิวิชาชีพต่างๆ มีทักษะการสื่อสารและมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ที่ดี  สร้างโอกาสในการขายและปิดการขายกับลูกค้า ให้บริการลูกค้า ยินดีต้อนรับเจ้าหน้าที่บริหารงานขายที่มากประสบการณ์พร้อมที่จะเติบโตในสายงานนี้ควบคู่ไปกับองค์กรของเรา

รายละเอียดงาน

รับผิดชอบยอดขายพัฒนาและใช้กลยุทธ์เพื่อเพิ่มยอดขายให้บรรลุเป้าหมาย
สร้างความสัมพันธ์กับลูกค้าใหม่และลูกค้าปัจจุบัน ส่งเสริมผลิตภัณฑ์และบริการ
วิเคราะห์สภาพตลาดและแนวโน้มเพื่อระบุโอกาสที่อาจเกิดขึ้น
เตรียมการนำเสนอการขายและข้อเสนอเพื่อนำเสนอต่อลูกค้า
ตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้าได้ภายในระยะเวลาที่กำหนด
ตอบคำถาม/ปัญหาต่างๆ กับลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับสินค้าและบริการของทางบริษัท
จัดทำรายงานและวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลเพื่อติดตามประสิทธิภาพ
คุณสมบัติ


วุฒิการศึกษาระดับ ปริญญาตรี สาขาเทคโนโลยีการศึกษา, การขาย, การตลาด, คอมพิเตอร์ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง                                                                                                                                                     
มีประสบการณ์ในการขายเกี่ยวกับเทคโนโลยี คอร์สการศึกษา แพลตฟอร์มต่างๆ หรือที่เกี่ยวข้อง อย่างน้อย 5 ปี

มีบุคลิกภาพที่ดี มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ มีใจรักงานบริการและทัศนคติในการทำงานที่ดี

มีทักษะในการเจรจา ต่อรอง ประสานงาน นัดหมายเป็นอย่างดี

สามารถทำงานภายใต้สภาวะความกดดันได้ดี มีภาวะผู้นำ

ความสามารถในการติดต่อสื่อสารเป็นภาษาอังกฤษ ได้ดี

หากสื่อสารภาษาจีนได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

หากมีความรู้ด้านโปรดักชั่น หรือวัสดุงานผลิตต่างๆ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

Customer Success (SaaS "CADDi DRAWER" )CADDI (THAILAND) CO., LTD.Job Highlights
3 year experience as customer success
Hybrid work, Salary review: twice a year
Fluent in Thai and EnglishWith the mission of "Unleashing the potential of the manufacturing industry," CADDi strives to create a world that can realize each manufacturer’s strength to create a flat, non-hierarchical relationship between customers and manufacturers.

We are challenging to transform the entire manufacturing supply chain from both upstream and downstream and to create an infrastructure that encourages companies with global potential to grow. We welcome those who can share CADDi's mission, vision, and culture.

We are looking for an experienced Customer Success Manager for our B2B SaaS Product, “Drawer”, to lead and build up our field sales team. The members in the position will be responsible for building operations in Thailand and leading a customer success team, developing strategies to maximize customer satisfaction and retention, and fostering strong relationships with our customers. If you're passionate about customer success and ready to make a significant impact on our startup's growth, we invite you to join us and lead our customer success efforts to new heights.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

Pre-Sales activity as a team:
Work closely with Field Sales member and provide trial or demo experience to enhance sales activities
Analyze customer pain point and consider and introduce potential use case to solve their problem
Customer Onboarding:
Lead the onboarding process for new customers, ensuring a smooth transition and understanding of our manufacturing solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to provide training and resources to customers..
Account Management:
Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with key customer accounts.
Understand customers' unique needs and challenges, and work to align our solutions with their goal.
Customer Engagement:
Proactively engage with customers to gather feedback, address concerns, and identify opportunities for improvement.
Organize regular check-ins and reviews to assess customer satisfaction and product performance.
Product Knowledge:
Develop an in-depth understanding of our manufacturing products and services.
Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to provide valuable insights to customers.
Renewals and Up selling:
Manage customer renewals and proactively identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling our manufacturing and drawer solutions.
Partnerships and Alliances:
Identify strategic partnerships and alliances that can enhance our market presence and customer acquisition efforts.
Reporting and Documentation:
Maintain detailed records of customer interactions and feedback.
Provide regular reports and updates to leadership on customer success efforts and outcomes.
Other general project management
Set and execute team goals and metrics (KGI/KPI)
Coordinate department projects to meet deadlines
Research and discover methods to increase customer engagement
Build an open-communication environment for your team
Monitor progress and submit performance reports
REQUIREMENTS

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS

A proven experience in customer success, account management, or a related role , preferably within the SaaS industry.
Possess a strong background in SaaS business, CRM/MA/peripheral tools, and best practices.
Data driven mindset with proficiency in using customer success tools and analytics.
Strong communication skills and negotiation skills with ability to work effectively with all levels of staff in a collaborative team environment.
A keen intellect, capable of advanced analytical and critical thinking, able to solve problems, and drive complex decision making.
Person who is willing to get his/her hands dirty, take ownership to deliver results, do whatever it takes no matter how strategic or operational that work is
In-depth knowledge of sales strategies, marketing, and customer success.
Professional English skill
PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

Experience in the manufacturing or relevant industry
Proven sales experience in software industry
Track record of over-achieving quota
Ability to multitasking, prioritize, and manage time effectively
Experience in business development, consulting, or digital transformation project

Job Purpose

  This position is responsible for managing distributor business in the assigned sales territories by building business partnership with distributors to achieve profitable growth both to the company and distributors, providing training and coaching distributors’ sales force to equip in market with professionalism and ability to manage existing stores and develop new stores, conducting business plan and business review with distributors mainly in terms of numeric distribution, sales performance and distributor operation. Do a basic analysis of sales data and providing recommendations to distributors to drive business results and maintain business advantage in the market.
Principle Accountability 


1) Manage sell-in performance of distributors

Work Closely with distributors, CREDIT,  PRE-SALE teams to boost sales performance, help distributors develop indirect stores to create a demand in market and also to ensure that Distributor can achieve Target and secure sustainable growth in business.

2) Manage sell-out performance of Sales team

Monitoring Sale performance to ensure in business achievement by working closely with CREDIT SALES, Route Supervisor and PRE-SALES by focusing sales-in to store and monitoring on store off - take & also drive distribution both in-width and in-depth distribution based on business direction in shop type.

Strategically manage top credit customers aligned with trade marketing activities.

Leverage territory insight and explore to new channel penetration for selling opportunity.

3) Recommend and advice in improvement of distributor’s operations

Warehouse and inventory (Stock Cover Day)

Customer service (Logistic Routing)

Accounting (Monitoring on Debt)

System support for invoicing, reporting and data processing and support distributors by conducting meetings and communication sessions with distributor owners and team.

Communication of messages and updates from BSTT to distributors

4) Sales Capability development in terms of Coaching and training distributors’ sales teams in order to enhance their professionalism and performance especially in the sales process and selling skills

Develop and coach Route Supervisor to be a territories expertise to control on effective territories routing to achieved store coverage.

Monitor Visit and call targets

Monitor on On-time payment collection and process

Report (such as order processing, scorecards, market reports)

Recommend how to make "In Store Excellent Execution"

5) Monitor DSO performance of distributors in the following areas:

Payment by distributors to BSTT must be carried out on time

Monitoring term of payment from indirect stores to distributors. Payment must be carried out according to the process and timeline

Monitor Distributor’s PRE-SALES about deposit payment cheques collected from indirect stores in the bank account and return all documents to distributors on time

6) Initial set up and support

Setup distributor operation and team during initial go live

Support RS with training and in field coaching with SR during initial go live

7) Others

Follow company regulations and all implement standard system

Other responsibilities as per Company assigned

Education

Bachelor’s degree in related field

Job Description

งานด้านสรรหาบุคลากร – ประกาศตำแหน่งงานว่าง, คัดเลือกพนักงานเบื้องต้น, ตรวจสุขภาพก่อนเข้างาน, ตรวจประวัติอาชญากรรม
จัดทำเอกสารการจ้างงาน, จัดเก็บแฟ้มประวัติพนักงาน, Time Attendance พนักงานประจำ (สำนักงานใหญ่)
จัดทำข้อมูลพนักงาน (Staff List) รายเดือนและค่าจ้าง, ตรวจสอบ OT พนักงาน (รายเดือน); Update ข้อมูลการลา Apply Leave, E-Time (OT only)
จัดทำหนังสือรับรองการทำงาน, หนังสือรับรองเงินเดือน, Slip เงินเดือน (เฉพาะพนักงานขับรถ, พนักงานสัญญาจ้างรายปี)
แจ้งพนักงานเข้า/ออก กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ (กรณีมีการเปลี่ยนแปลง), ปรับอัตราเงินสมทบกองทุน (รายเดือน/รายปี)
จัดเตรียมข้อมูลในแบบฟอร์มการประเมินประจำปี
จัดทำประกาศพนักงานใหม่/ลาออก ปรับเปลี่ยนตำแหน่ง วันหยุดประจำปี etc.; จัดส่งแบบฟอร์ม JD, OJT ประเมินผลพนักงานช่วงทดลองงาน พร้อมรวบรวมและจัดเก็บ
ให้ข้อมูลและชี้แจงหน่วยงานตรวจสอบ เช่น ISO, Internal Audit, External Audit ในงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง
เตรียมแบบฟอร์มคำขอรับเงินคืน (สำหรับผู้ประกันตน ที่ทำงานกับนายจ้างหลายราย) ส่งให้ ปกส. (รายปี)
จัดเตรียมเอกสารยื่นแบบแสดงสภาพการจ้างและสภาพการทำงานของสถานประกอบกิจการ (คร.11) ของสำนักงานใหญ่ให้กับ สนง. สวัสดิการและคุ้มครองแรงงาน กรุงเทพฯ (รายปี)
จัดเตรียมเอกสารยื่น สนง. สวัสดิการและคุ้มครองแรงงาน เมื่อคณะกรรมการฯ ครบวาระ 2 ปี (ทุก 2 ปี/ครั้ง)
Revised Actuarial Valuation Report (ภาระผูกพันผลประโยชน์พนักงาน) ส่งให้ Nida (2 ปี/ครั้ง หรือกรณีมีการเปลี่ยนแปลง)
ประสานงานกับ broker ในการเลือกประกันสุขภาพ/อุบัติเหตุกลุ่ม และนำเสนอผู้บริหาร, ทำประกันการเดินทางต่างประเทศให้ผู้บริหาร/พนักงาน
จัดตรวจสุขภาพพนักงานประจำปี
จัดเตรียมข้อมูลสำหรับการจัดทำ 56-1 One Report ประจำปี 2566 ในส่วนของ HR

Assistant Human Resources Manager/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการฝ่ายทรัพยากรมนุษย์Driessen Catering Equipment Ltd.Job Highlights
Native English speaker
Creative
New GenerationAre you a dynamic thinker with exceptional English communication skills?

If you are an individual who thrives on taking initiative, possesses outstanding English communication skills (native speaker or graduated abroad is a must), and dreams of a dynamic career in the aviation industry, we have the perfect opportunity for you!

About Us:

Driessen Catering Equipment is a leading innovator in aviation catering equipment production, dedicated to ensuring that every flight is a culinary delight. Our mission is to provide catering equipment solutions that enable our global customers to deliver the best possible catering experience. We are committed to excellence, creativity, and continuous improvement, and our success is driven by a talented and passionate team.

Job Description:

As a Human Resources Assistant Manager at Driessen Catering Equipment, you will be a vital part of our journey to maintaining a high-performing team. You will play a pivotal role in helping us attract, develop, and retain top talent, all while ensuring compliance with aviation industry regulations.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with HR Director to develop and implement HR policies and procedures specific to the aviation industry.
Assist in talent acquisition by sourcing, screening, and interviewing candidates for positions critical to our success.
Contribute to employee onboarding and orientation programs, ensuring a smooth transition into our dynamic work environment.
Foster positive employee relations by addressing inquiries and concerns promptly and effectively.
Support performance management and development initiatives to nurture employee growth.
Coordinate HR projects and initiatives related to aviation safety and compliance.
Serve as a key point of contact for employees, providing guidance and ensuring open communication channels.
Contribute to the design and delivery of aviation-specific training and development programs.
Efficiently manage HR administrative tasks to ensure smooth operations.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in human resources or a related field.
Native English speaker or graduate with English proficiency from an international institution.
Proven ability to take initiative, think creatively, and problem-solve.
Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build effective working relationships.
Knowledge of manufacturing industry regulations and standards is a plus but not mandatory.
Prior HR or related experience in aviation is preferred but not mandatory for exceptional candidates.

What We Offer:

Competitive salary and benefits package.
A supportive and innovative work environment.
Opportunities for career advancement in the aviation industry.
The chance to make a meaningful impact on our organization's growth.

If you are a dynamic, creative, and proactive individual with a passion for HR and the aviation industry, we invite you to join our team and help us continue soaring to new heights at Driessen Catering Equipment

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their qualifications and why they are the ideal fit for this role via Jobsdb. Please include "HR Assistant Manager Application - [Your Name]" in the subject line.

Driessen Catering Equipment is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion in our workplace.

Come aboard our journey of culinary aviation excellence! Your initiative and communication skills could be the key to unlocking your dream career as a Human Resources Assistant Manager at Driessen Catering Equipment. Apply today!undefined

R&D/Program Financial Controller (2024)FORVIA Faurecia Clarion Electronics (Thailand)Job Highlights
Control budget, periodic forecasts, Mid Term Plans
Financial analysis / Program BP P&L
Good in English Communication / SAP systemsOverall responsibilities and duties:
The Program Controller is responsible of financial aspects for one or several programs. He ensures the data reliability in line with process and finance program golden rules, and the optimization of the programs' profitability and cash
The main missions of the role are:

Ensure program controlling procedures and Golden Rules compliance
Ensure program controlling procedure mandatory implementation
Alert line manager & functional manager in case of discrepancies
Check material rates & exchange rate alignment with Budget / SP
Check Plant PMT/Budget P&L alignment with Program BP P&L
Check ECR/ECO cost incorporation in product/upfront cost
Check Inflation (Labor, others…) hypothesis compliance vs SP….
Secure business plan and customer (offer & LOI) /supplier contractual offer consistency
Secure BP consistency with payment terms/amount for Tooling, D&D, Piece price, Raw mat update, Volume update, Exchange Rate….
Secure LTA hypothesis in supplier and customer contract
Secure Legal & Tax (VAT,….) applicable conditions for toolings.
Secure BP assumptions by comparing with plant current data / budget / SP
Support, under program manager authority, selected profitability improvement actions
Support fully the Program Manager in all financial impacts investigations to help driving the program profitability towards target
Provide Make or Buy financial analysis
Participate in the sourcing committee
Provide ECR/ECO full cost view & propose financial driven potential selling price
Highlight Program Cash status and provide recommendations to the management
Monitor Program Cash Curve at any time & communicate it towards Core team
Propose action plan to achieve cash Target
Challenge Upfront level in term of cost as well as payment method:
Provide and secure R&D controlling inputs
Check hours booked by cost center & functions to the program on monthly basis
Check technical/work progress versus expenses
Check opened & closed Work Package
Participate to forecast / budget / SP preparation for all program related revenues and expenses as well as cash in/out timing (new program financials, hours, D&D, prototypes, tooling, IFRS15) forecast per customer / program) and analyze actual variations during closing vs. forecast / budget
Built R&D line (core team, engineering / non engineering) in P&L program forecast / Budget / SP and analyze actual variations during closing vs. forecast / budget
Provide capitalization / inventory booking data for the related program and run related transactions in SAP (hours, D&D, prototypes, tooling, IFRS15)
Lead costing team activities and secure business plan update processes in time
Participate to BP schedule & organize costing data flow upstream
Organize Risk & Opportunities financial backing (cost….)
Provide program financial communication towards core team, management and plants involved
Update BP & bridge the gap between release
Prepare Forecast/Budget/SP inputs (PPA, costs, selling price, margin targets, cash).
Provide loss to completion inputs for the related program
Provide monthly (at least quarterly) financial inputs for the program dashboard
Transfer gradually business plan cost data source to plants from Production & Design Process phase:
Communicate & Share program standard cost view to plant
Validate/Follow up startup costs & convergence plan
Validate/Follow up plant budget for SOP year
Participate to program post audit at SOP+3
 Qualifications:
 Minimum education level:  Bachelor’s degree in Finance/Business or Engineering.
Experience: 3 to 5 years of professional experience, according to size and complexity of the site, including a first controlling experience at plant level.
Familiarity with Industrial Information Systems and Flows
Automotive and SAP knowledge is a plus
Understands all P&L concepts, significance of Variable and Gross Margins, ROCE, IRR, and OI.
Business minded, Risk management and Problem solving.
Strong Teamwork and advanced planning and organizational skills with pro-active mind-set.
Good communications skills
Fluent in English

The Employee is aware and ensures the respect of the Internal Rules, Code of Ethics and Management Code applicable in the establishment to which she/he is assigned.

As an employee, you are also required to:

Secure internal control with the support of financial controller and finance network
Abide by the Faurecia Code of Ethics. The code is summarised as below:
o   Respect for fundamental rights.o   Development of economic and social dialogue.o   Development of skills.o   Ethics and business conduct.%MCEPASTEBIN%undefined

Franchise ManagerBonjour Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Selling Concepts, Business Strategy
Great Interpersonal Skills, Good Communication
Understand franchisor businessesMain Job Tasks and Responsibilities                

Franchisee Manager will be responsible for planning and managing the franchising business of Company. He / She will be responsible for developing franchising opportunities and for offering continuous support to franchisees, to ensure the overall success of the franchisor as well as the franchisee.

 Franchise Opportunity Marketing

Prepare and execute the marketing strategy for Company’s’ franchisee opportunity: attracting newer franchisees.
Develop the budget for franchise development. Monitor and ensure that budgets are met.
Franchisee Identification, Selection and Development

Identify and research potential markets to launch new franchisee and advise GM of new opportunities.
Screen potential franchisee by analyzing investment requirements, franchisee’s potential, and financials, franchisee experience and vision
Finalize the deal with franchisee by negotiating terms and conditions of each franchisee agreement
Responsible for the launch and development of the franchisee as per the agreed terms and conditions.
Franchisee Management

Assist in the development of Franchise Business Plans
Ensure the financial performance and revenue targets of the franchisee is achieved through analysis of its Profit & Loss and KPIs as well as Standard Operating Procedures of the company.
Work as point of contact between the franchisee and the franchisor and ensure that any issues/concerns are aptly and timely addressed.
Support the day-to-day management of franchise. Advice and support franchisees with all areas of their business including: store standards, stock management, customer relationship, staffing and recruitment, finances and payments, cost control, expansion.
Ensure franchisor suggested systems/ processes are deployed & practiced in the franchisee.
Ensure that Company’s brand is communicated and maintained in all franchisee communications and marketing activities.
Ensure that the franchisee is in compliance with legal and statutory policies and procedures
Franchise legal responsibilities – ensure franchise agreement renewals, fee/ payment collection, and keeping franchise agreements up to date with current legislation.
Franchisee Training & Development

Develop the training program for the franchisee.
Conduct the trainings as per the program.
Ensure that franchisee and its staff are trained enough to provide the service experience in line with Company’s customer policies.
Qualifications

Bachelor of or other related fields.   
Selling: Concepts, Business Strategy, Corporate services, Marketing, PR. Should be very good at Sales and Business Development.
Communication: Presentations to GM, internal office coordination
Personality: Great Interpersonal Skills, Good Communication and a pleasing personality.
Analytical: Understand franchisor businesses and ability to match franchisee’s requirements with franchisor’s vision.
Track Record: Go Getter, Must have Persistence, Result Oriented and be able to achieve revenue targets. Must have a proven track record.
Experience:  at least 3yrs of experience in store/franchise development and management.
 Outlook: Absolute professional with long term career focus. High ethical standards of integrity & dependability
Leadership: Multi-tasker with leadership skills and hunger for growth.
PC: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Internundefined

Wind Turbine InspectorNES Fircroft (Thailand) Ltd.Job Highlights
Contract position
Intermediate English communication
Experience on turbine inspectionLocation: Thailand

Job Type: Contract 

Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and dedicated Wind Turbine Inspector to join our team on a 6-month contract basis in Thailand. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring inspection work quality and safety, with a particular focus on WTG OEM’s compliance.

Key Responsibilities:

Inspection and Maintenance: Conduct regular inspections of wind turbines to identify any signs of abnormalities, including but not limited to, wear and tear, damages, or performance issues, with a strong emphasis on compliances & international WTG OEM’s standard practices. Knowledge and familiarity with maintenance of the wind turbines are a plus.
Compliance & international OEM’s standard: Investigate whether if all wind turbines meet or exceed international WTG OEM’s standards and applicable regulations. Stay up to date with said standards/requirements and adopt necessary changes to ensure compliance.
Data Collection & Documentation: Collect and record data related to the WTG’s performance/inspection and all associated site activities in all necessary forms such as videography, photographic, documents (both digital and hard copy) in accordance with given guidelines. Generate reports and provide regular updates to management.
Troubleshooting: Having ability to identify and troubleshoot technical problems in wind turbines, diagnose root causes, and implement effective fixes as per given or international WTG OEM’s standards.

Trade AnalystTE Connectivity Distribution (Thailand) LimitedJob Highlights
Experience in Trade Compliance & Custom Compliance
Strong on custom classification,valuation,HS Code
Fluent in Thai & Intermediate English LanguageTrade Analyst-Trade Compliance/Custom Compliance
This is WFH job (remote working) and need basis travel to Lamphun(occasional once in a month).

Job Overview

We are building a world class Global Trade Services (GTS) organization and the Industrial Business Unit APAC Trade Analyst is a new position within GTS, that will play a critical role in supporting trade operations and compliance within the Industrial Business Unit (IND BU) in APAC region.

The GTS Industrial Trade Analyst serves as a trusted advisor and key team member within TE’s Operational Compliance team for the BU. The purpose of this role is to facilitate TE’s compliance, at the BU level, with import and export regulations in APAC region to enhance global trade compliance, reduce risk, increase responsiveness to issues and opportunities, and support effective operational aspects of international trade.

This role reports into GTS IND BU APAC Trade Supervisor and is a key member of the Global Trade Services (GTS) team. As part of the GTS team, the IND APAC Trade Analyst will join a group of professionals who are passionate about ensuring the future growth of the business by providing business solutions for compliance with global trade laws and regulations. 

The successful candidate will be able to collaborate and thrive in a global environment with focus on APAC region, especially in Thailand while maintaining integrity, taking accountability, and working together.

Responsibilities:

Trade Compliance Activities in the BU

                     Execute trade operations and provide compliance oversight for the assigned BU in Thailand to ensure TE’s compliance with import/export laws and regulations.
                     Maintain trade operations and compliance activities in accordance with TE policies, procedures, and controls, in collaboration with key stakeholders throughout the Industrial BU
                     Act as a point of contact for Industrial stakeholders on trade-related matters
                     Work with BU stakeholders and counsel to understand business changes and develop trade-related solutions/strategies and controls to ensure compliance.
                     Maintain Industrial-level Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and reporting to ensure efficiency and effectiveness of the operations.

Partner with Trade Compliance Professionals and Stakeholders across the Enterprise

                     Partner with GTS Governance to monitor trade compliance regulatory and legislative changes, assess the potential impact to Industrial, and determine the necessary actions and communications to the appropriate stakeholders.
                     Work with GTS Governance team to conduct trade compliance audits and oversee corrective action plans.
                     Partner with GTS Governance to develop and administer effective trade compliance training as required throughout the region and organization.
                     Ensure appropriate utilization of the GTS Operations Service Center for product classification (import and export), restricted party screening, and duty savings compliance, and otherwise ensure proper country of origin determination, valuation, and admissibility.
                     Work with the Operational Service Centers to identify, evaluate and administer opportunities to facilitate trade in a cost-effective and compliant manner (e.g., make use of applicable Free Trade Agreements, Foreign Trade Zones, etc.)
                     Establish and maintain relationships with internal functions, including corporate functions, to encourage awareness of global trade compliance issues, pro-actively identify trade risk and threats, and develop appropriate trade compliance controls.

What your background should look like:

Success in the role requires strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills, highly developed oral and written communication skills, and the ability to work with interdisciplinary teams (internal and external) to drive issues and projects to conclusion. 

In addition, successful candidate will have the following qualifications, experience, and skills:

                     Bachelor's degree required (international business, supply chain, law, or related field)
                     4+ years’ experience in global/regional trade compliance.
                     APAC and Thailand trade compliance experience is a must. Good to have US / Global Trade Compliance experience/ knowledge.
                     Functional knowledge of import and export regulations and familiarity with customs practices in Thailand
                     Knowledge of Thai Export Controls with a good understanding of the US Export Controls (ITAR & EAR)
                     Proven ability to work with variety of business groups, including supply chain, legal, procurement and finance.
                     Experience in close collaboration with customs and export control authorities,
                     Ability to foster teamwork and internal and external relationships.
                     Excellent organizational habits and priority management
                     Customer focused with a commitment to quality.
                     Fluent Thai language skills, other foreign languages as a plus
                     Travel may be necessary in fulfillment of responsibilities.undefined

close to MRT Purple Line

Creativity and a genuine passion for responsible travel are at the core of all we do at Khiri Travel. Accounting Manager (AM) leads a five-person Accounting Department at Khiri Travel Thailand (KTT). Here we handle all our financial affairs with clients and suppliers, taxes and ensure that our team is supported with all administrative matters. Efficiency, material accuracy and financial integrity are at the core of our work. Learning, adopting and thoroughly using our IT platform systems and processes are critical for the success and efficiency of the accounting department at KTT and will be an important basis for assessment of the AM and the team. At Khiri Travel we value long-term relations over short-term gains or losses. For this AM position we hire primarily on attitude, integrity and learning ability, as well as work experience, and train for skills including proficiency of our proprietary IT platform system.

Reporting to: Business Manager, KTT (dotted line to Khiri Travel group finance – “Khiri Core”)

Demonstrated leadership skills and ability to actively manage others
Responsible for personal & team members performances
